name: SpongeBob
dialog: This is it, Gary!

name: Gary
dialog: Meow. [SpongeBob's bed bounces up and flings SpongeBob onto the calendar, where he lands on March 3rd with the words "boating exam today!" on it then drops to the floor]

name: SpongeBob
dialog: The big boating exam is today! I've never felt so capable! [A door opens from underneath him. He comes out of his house riding a unicycle] I'm ready, I'm ready, I'm ready. Squidward! Squidward!

name: Squidward
dialog: What?

name: SpongeBob
dialog: I'm ready, Squidward! [rides his unicycle around Squidward's house]

name: Squidward
dialog: Ready to move?

name: SpongeBob
dialog: No, I'm ready to pass my boating test. [rides his unicycle towards Mrs. Puff's Boating School] I'm ready, I'm ready, I'm ready... [stops his unicycle near a dumpster and jumps off of it] I'm ready-eady-eady-eady-eady-eady-eady-eady-ready. Well, pal, I won't be needing you anymore. [throws the unicycle into the dumpster] I'm ready, I'm ready, I'm ready! Oh, yeah! I'm ready!

name: SpongeBob
dialog: [snaps his fingers] Hey, I'm getting mine next!

name: SpongeBob
dialog: Okay, see you on the road. I'm ready! Here I come, Mrs. Puff! I'm ready, I'm ready, I'm ready, I'm ready, I'm ready, I'm ready, I'm ready. [jumps around the boardwalk. Camera goes inside the school, as a female pufferfish looks out the window and sees SpongeBob jumping around.]

name: Puff
dialog: [sighs] I'm not ready. [opens the door]

name: SpongeBob
dialog: Hi, Mrs. Puff! Today is the day I'm going to pass my boating exam!

name: Puff
dialog: [with a clipboard and a pen in hand] We'll see about that, SpongeBob. First we must...

name: SpongeBob
dialog: First I must pass the oral exam. I am confident in my abilities to successfully succeed.

name: Puff
dialog: I know. Okay, #1: What is the front of the boat?

name: SpongeBob
dialog: The bow. [Mrs. Puff writes down his answer]

name: Puff
dialog: What is the back?

name: SpongeBob
dialog: Stern. [Mrs. Puff writes down his answer]

name: Puff
dialog: #3: Right is...

name: SpongeBob
dialog: Starboard. [answers the remaining questions] Port. Skipper. Deck. Cabin. Galley. Keel. 1924. [Mrs. Puff writes down his answers]

name: Puff
dialog: You've passed the oral test. [sarcastically] What a surprise. [gets in the boat and secures herself tightly] Now it's time to once again take the driving portion of the exam. Okay, SpongeBob, get in the boat.

name: SpongeBob
dialog: Oh, in this boat right here? [looks at his watch] Is it time already?

name: Puff
dialog: Get in the boat, SpongeBob.

name: SpongeBob
dialog: Oh yeah, absolutely. [gets in and closes his eyes with a smile]

name: Puff
dialog: All you have to do is get on the track.

name: Puff
dialog: Okay, SpongeBob, what's the first thing you do?

name: Puff
dialog: No, no. First thing is to start the boat. [turns the engine on and SpongeBob goes crazy] SpongeBob? SpongeBob? Relax, it's only the boat.

name: SpongeBob
dialog: The boat?

name: Puff
dialog: Okay, now what do you do next?

name: SpongeBob
dialog: Floor it?

name: Puff
dialog: Yes... no! No, don't floor it.

name: SpongeBob
dialog: Floor it?!

name: Puff
dialog: No, no, don't, don't floor it!

name: SpongeBob
dialog: Okay, floor it! [SpongeBob slams on the accelerator and starts driving backwards really fast]

name: Puff
dialog: No! No, no, no, nooooo! [the boat whizzes by some spectators before crashing into a lighthouse. After crashing, Mrs. Puff inflates to three times her size. The lighthouse falls, and Mrs. Puff speaks with a deep voice] Oh, SpongeBob, why?

name: Fred
dialog: My leg...!

name: SpongeBob
dialog: [in his bed at night] I don't know why, Gary. I don't know. I'm tired of failing that boating test. I've already taken it 37 times.

name: Gary
dialog: Meow.

name: SpongeBob
dialog: Okay, 38. [puts his pillow on his head]

name: Gary
dialog: [puts on SpongeBob's boots] Meow.

name: SpongeBob
dialog: No, Gary, I'm not walking.

name: Patrick
dialog: [over walkie-talkie in SpongeBob's bed] SpongeBob, this is Star Ranger, over.

name: SpongeBob
dialog: [through walkie-talkie] What is it, Patrick?

name: Patrick
dialog: [through walkie-talkie] I got a surprise for you.

name: SpongeBob
dialog: [through walkie-talkie] Oh, Patrick, I'm not in the mood.

name: Patrick
dialog: [through walkie-talkie] Get out of bed. [SpongeBob gets out of bed]

name: SpongeBob
dialog: [through walkie-talkie] Okay, now what, Patrick?

name: Patrick
dialog: [through walkie-talkie] Go to your closet for a surprise. [SpongeBob slides down a room and stands up in front of his closet door]

name: SpongeBob
dialog: [through walkie-talkie] Okay, I'm at the closet.

name: Patrick
dialog: [through walkie-talkie] Listen carefully. What's pink and square at the same time?

name: SpongeBob
dialog: [through walkie-talkie] I don't know, Patrick. [opens the closet door, revealing Patrick wearing SpongeBob's clothes]

name: Patrick
dialog: Patrick SquarePants!

name: SpongeBob
dialog: [deadpan] Pat, don't do that. [sits in a chair] I've got too much to worry about.

name: Patrick
dialog: What's the problem?

name: SpongeBob
dialog: I can't pass my boating exam. I've taken it 37...

name: Gary
dialog: Meow.

name: SpongeBob
dialog: ...uhh, 38 times. I know all the answers... [Patrick's square pants rip off] ...until I get behind the wheel. I just need something to help me think straight.

name: Patrick
dialog: Thinking straight is what I do. You drive and I'll do all the thinking for you. [takes SpongeBob's walkie-talkie]

name: SpongeBob
dialog: How are we going to do that? [Patrick puts a walkie-talkie into SpongeBob's head with the antenna coming out of the top]

name: Patrick
dialog: Come in, SpongeBob. Hello? Hello?

name: SpongeBob
dialog: Hey! I can hear you in my head! This is great! While I'm taking the test, you can give me all the answers. [notices the antenna sticking out] Wait a minute, Patrick. Won't I look silly with this antenna coming out of my head? [Patrick puts a tall hat over the antenna. Next, we see a big telescope peeking out SpongeBob's upstairs window]

name: Patrick
dialog: [through walkie-talkie] Pat to Sponge, Pat to Sponge, testing, testing. [looking through the telescope at SpongeBob] Testing, testing, testing, testing, testing, testing! [loudly] Testing! [screams] Test, test. Do you read?!

name: SpongeBob
dialog: Sponge to Pat, I read you loud and clear, over.

name: Patrick
dialog: [through walkie-talkie] Got your apple ready? [SpongeBob shows an apple] Lucky undergarments? Hold on. Hold on. [focuses in on the underwear with the telescope to reveal the word lucky on the top of it] Bingo! Underwear, apple, and me. You're ready to get that license. Uh-oh, here comes Mrs. Puff! Act natural. [SpongeBob jumps out of the boat, then gets on the ground on all fours and starts chewing grass.]

name: SpongeBob
dialog: [Moos like a cow]

name: Patrick
dialog: [through walkie-talkie] No, no, get in the boat! [SpongeBob jumps in the boat. An ambulance arrives with its siren on and drops off Mrs. Puff] Give her the apple. [SpongeBob gives her the apple]

name: SpongeBob
dialog: Here you go, ma'am. [Mrs. Puff throws apple in her mouth and swallows]

name: Puff
dialog: Let's get this over with. [takes a deep breath] What's the first thing you do? [puts hands and arms over head for protection]

name: SpongeBob
dialog: [starts to get scared] Uhh...

name: Patrick
dialog: [through walkie-talkie] Start the boat. [SpongeBob starts the boat. The engine starting up causes Mrs. Puff to go crazy]

name: SpongeBob
dialog: Mrs. Puff. Mrs. Puff!

name: Puff
dialog: Whoa-ho! Huh? What?

name: SpongeBob
dialog: It's okay, it's only the boat.

name: Puff
dialog: The boat? You started the boat?

name: SpongeBob
dialog: I... I think so.

name: Puff
dialog: Oh. Well... what's the second thing you do?

name: Patrick
dialog: [through walkie-talkie] No, no, put it in drive.

name: SpongeBob
dialog: Put it in drive?

name: Puff
dialog: Yes, yes, yes! [SpongeBob pushes lever down to drive] Put it in drive. Then what?

name: SpongeBob
dialog: [lifts leg up] Floor it?

name: Puff
dialog: No! [screams] No!

name: Patrick
dialog: [through walkie-talkie] Freeze, mister! [SpongeBob stops] Big toe. [SpongeBob's big toe pops out of his shoe and gently pushes the accelerator down]

name: Puff
dialog: Oh, gracious. Oh, gracious! Oh-oh. Ha-ha! Ah, we haven't crashed yet.

name: Patrick
dialog: [through walkie-talkie] Okay, you're coming to your first turn. [a giant wall with the word wall on it is shown and a left curve]

name: Puff
dialog: Oh no, the first turn. Please, tell me you know what to do at the first turn!

name: Patrick
dialog: [through walkie-talkie] Left. [SpongeBob turns left]

name: Puff
dialog: Oh!

name: Patrick
dialog: [through walkie-talkie] Right. [SpongeBob turns right]

name: Puff
dialog: Oh! My, this is splendid, SpongeBob. You're doing fine.

name: Montage
dialog: [SpongeBob stops at a stop sign and looks both ways before starting to drive again. Then drives around with his left arm out making a signal. Patrick still talking to SpongeBob through the walkie-talkie as SpongeBob drives over a big hill in the road. As Mrs. Puff writes a couple things on her clipboard, Patrick is putting on another pair of SquarePants. SpongeBob pulls back on the boat and the boat jumps in the air over a big anchor. Patrick finds SpongeBob's diary and begins to read and laugh at it as SpongeBob jumps off a ramp through a ring of fire. Fred is walking across the course but SpongeBob stops the boat and helps him walk across. He gets back in the boat as Patrick is eating out of SpongeBob's fridge. SpongeBob is sitting back and driving with his feet and driving upside down.]

name: Puff
dialog: Splendid! Wonderful! [sign that reads finish line is just ahead] There's the finish line. It's unbelievable. You've shown the most spectacular improvement of any student I've ever seen. What's your secret? A little radio in your head? [everyone laughs] Oh, and under that hat is some kind of, uhh, antenna? [everyone laughs again] And some guy miles away from here is giving you all the answers? [everyone laughs a third time] Oh, yes, but that would be cheating.

name: Patrick
dialog: Cheating! [laughing hysterically]

name: SpongeBob
dialog: I'm cheating?! Mrs. Puff!

name: Puff
dialog: Yes, my star pupil?

name: SpongeBob
dialog: I think I'm cheating.

name: Puff
dialog: What's that, dear? [SpongeBob takes a hold of Mrs. Puff]

name: SpongeBob
dialog: I think I am cheating!

name: Puff
dialog: You've... you've let go of the wheel.

name: SpongeBob
dialog: I do have an antenna under my hat! [shows the antenna under his hat] There is a guy giving me all the answers! It's all true! [crying] I'm cheating! I'm cheating! I'm cheating!

name: Patrick
dialog: What?! [runs out of SpongeBob's house and back under his rock, crying]

name: SpongeBob
dialog: I'm sorry, Mrs. Puff! I'm sorry!

name: Puff
dialog: [panicking] The wheel, SpongeBob! The wheel...

name: SpongeBob
dialog: Cheating... I'm a cheater! Cheater...

name: Puff
dialog: No, no, no! It's quite alright! You can cheat that way!

name: SpongeBob
dialog: No... I'm cheating...!

name: Puff
dialog: At least, SpongeBob...

name: SpongeBob
dialog: I'm cheating!

name: Puff
dialog: Cheat that way! That way!

name: SpongeBob
dialog: I'm a cheater, cheater, pumpkin eater!

name: Puff
dialog: It's okay to cheat today!

name: Puff
dialog: That way! That way! Cheat that way!

name: SpongeBob
dialog: Cheater...! [crashes offscreen head-on into the same lighthouse. Mrs. Puff inflates with a look of despair. The lighthouse falls yet again]

name: Puff
dialog: [deep voice] Oh, SpongeBob, why?

name: SpongeBob
dialog: Mrs. Puff, I think I cheated.

name: Fred
dialog: My leg! [some time later, EMTs are wheeling a still-inflated Mrs. Puff away on a gurney]

name: SpongeBob
dialog: Uhh, I'm sorry for letting you down again, Mrs. Puff.

name: Puff
dialog: [normal voice] It's okay, SpongeBob, you didn't mean it. Okay, boys, take me away. [EMTs shove Mrs. Puff into the ambulance]

name: SpongeBob
dialog: Don't worry, Mrs. Puff. I'll try harder next semester. [Mrs. Puff cries as she is taken away by the ambulance] It'll be great! [walks away] Only now I don't even have my bike.

name: Gary
dialog: [with SpongeBob's unicycle] Meow.

name: SpongeBob
dialog: Gary! My bike! You found it! This sponge is still mobile! [rides away on his bike with Gary on his head] Alright, let's go surprise someone at the hospital!

name: SpongeBob
dialog: Wake up, Gary.

name: Gary
dialog: [wakes up] Meow?

name: SpongeBob
dialog: We're moving today!

name: Gary
dialog: [quizzically] Meow?

name: SpongeBob
dialog: That's right! We're leaving home. We're going to become peasants! [puts on a hat and fake beard]

name: Gary
dialog: Meow.

name: SpongeBob
dialog: [takes away Gary's bowl] No more food. [gives Gary a plate with clams on it] Sorry, Gary. Peasants only eat mashed-up clam shells. [SpongeBob puts salt in the shells, and Gary starts crying] April Fools! [takes off the outfit and puts Gary's food bowl back onto the floor] There ya go, pal!

name: Gary
dialog: Meow. [eats]

name: SpongeBob
dialog: [goes into the kitchen] Whew, I'm thirsty! [takes a big glass of lemonade out of the fridge] [deep male voice] This is an extreme thirst! [sets the lemonade down on the floor; bubble transition to him putting all the lemonade into a lot of small glasses with umbrellas]

name: SpongeBob
dialog: [normal voice] Whew, I'm exhausted. I sure can't wait to drink all these drinks! April Fools! [holds up a mirror] To me! [laughs obnoxiously and walks outside and towards work. Squidward sees him]

name: Squidward
dialog: What's he so happy about? [walks by the calendar and notices it's April Fools Day. He panics] April 1st?! [screams] April Fools Day is SpongeBob's favorite holiday! [puts a heating pad on his head and dials the number for the Krusty Krab] Mr. Krabs, I can't come in today. I caught something terrible.

name: Krabs
dialog: [over phone] What'd you catch?

name: Squidward
dialog: I caught sight of the calendar.

name: Krabs
dialog: Oh, hold on, Squidward, there's someone here to see you. He says he's from the Barnacle Bay Art Museum and he wants to honor you as artist of the month.

name: Squidward
dialog: I have arrived. [SpongeBob and Mr. Krabs laugh] What's so funny? Where's the art dealer?

name: Krabs
dialog: You just missed him.

name: SpongeBob
dialog: Yeah, but he told us to tell you...

name: Squidward
dialog: Tell me what?

name: SpongeBob
dialog: [whispers into Squidward's ear] He told me to tell you... April Fools.

name: Squidward
dialog: [lays his hat on the table] Well, it's been nice working here. [he walks off] Thanks for everything, Mr. Krabs.

name: SpongeBob
dialog: Squidward, wait!

name: Squidward
dialog: Just send my last check to the P.O. box, Mr. Krabs!

name: SpongeBob
dialog: Wait, Squidward! [grabs Squidward's legs] It was just a joke! No more jokes on you today, I promise!

name: Squidward
dialog: You do?

name: SpongeBob
dialog: Sure, there are lots of other willing participants. Right, Mr. Krabs?

name: Squidward
dialog: Well, as long as it's not me.

name: Shell
dialog: Excuse me, could you tell me where the forks are?

name: SpongeBob
dialog: They're right here, lady! [leads her to the utensils]

name: Shell
dialog: [picks up a spoon] But this is a spoon.

name: SpongeBob
dialog: April Fools! [laughs; Squidward stares at SpongeBob and he runs away; bubble transition to SpongeBob behind the register; a customer comes up to him] Welcome to the Krusty Krab. How may I help you?

name: Nat
dialog: [raises up his left arm] Yeah, give me two large fries and a Jumbo Krabby Patty.

name: SpongeBob
dialog: [points at something] Hey, what's that?

name: Nat
dialog: Well, I didn't see anything. [notices that SpongeBob is gone] Hey, where'd that other guy go?

name: SpongeBob
dialog: April Fools! I'm right here!

name: Nat
dialog: [laughs] Hey, that was pretty good.

name: Squidward
dialog: What are you doing behind the counter?!

name: Tom
dialog: Excuse me, can I get a couple of ice cubes in here, please?

name: SpongeBob
dialog: Sure! A couple of ice cubes coming up! [fills the cup with ice and comes back whistling] Here you go.

name: Tom
dialog: Thanks. [he takes a sip of his drink; SpongeBob titters and Tom looks at him, but SpongeBob stops before Tom turns around] Huh? [SpongeBob is silent, so Tom takes another sip of his drink; SpongeBob starts giggling again and then Tom turns around and looks at him, but SpongeBob stops before he turns around] Huh? [SpongeBob is silent, so Tom finishes his drink] Ah...

name: SpongeBob
dialog: [laughs loudly and obnoxiously] April Fools! [Tom grabs SpongeBob by the collar, suddenly panicked]

name: Tom
dialog: What did you do to my drink?!

name: SpongeBob
dialog: I... [giggles] I... [giggles]

name: Tom
dialog: You what?!

name: SpongeBob
dialog: You asked for a couple of ice cubes in your drink, and I only put in one! [laughs]

name: Tom
dialog: I guess that is pretty funny. [laughs as he walks off] Yeah.

name: SpongeBob
dialog: [laughs so hard his tongue pops off] Hey, your shoes untied. [tongue looks down] April Fools! You're not wearing shoes! [laughs and hugs his tongue, which smiles. Then they laugh into the microphone; everyone hears it; in the kitchen, Squidward tries to mute the sound with tissues, but he can still hear it] April Fools! [Squidward drops a plate]

name: Squidward
dialog: That's it! SpongeBob and his stupid pranks! I'm going to show him what a real prank is all about! [bubble transition to him squirting some mustard inside a rope circle then he chuckles and shows SpongeBob the mess]

name: SpongeBob
dialog: Oh, boy! Something for me to clean up! [starts cleaning it and Squidward is standing next to a rope which he is about to cut]

name: Squidward
dialog: April Fools! [laughs as he cuts the rope which grabs SpongeBob]

name: SpongeBob
dialog: Whooaahh! [the rope sends him into some bags of flour. Squidward is laughing through all of this and rolls on the floor. Then SpongeBob is taken around a bar] Whoa! Blblblblblblbl... [screams as he is sent slamming face-first into the wall]

name: Customers
dialog: Oh, no!

name: SpongeBob
dialog: Whoooaa! [Cut to Squidward cheerleading, laughing, and jumping into the air. Then SpongeBob smashes into the ceiling]

name: Squidward
dialog: [runs and holds out his arms to catch SpongeBob] I'll catch you, SpongeBob! [he giggles to himself. SpongeBob screams as he plummets toward Squidward, who quickly sets out a garbage can in front of him, and SpongeBob falls into the goop in the can] Oops. [dumps SpongeBob, who is now the shape of the can, out of the garbage can] April Fools, you little sausage! [he laughs; SpongeBob sobs hysterically and runs out of the Krusty Krab] SpongeBob! I was just kidding! C'mon, c'mon. You guys know I was just kidding… Right?

name: Wobbles
dialog: Aww, man, poor kid.

name: Shubie
dialog: That guy has definitely got some issues to work out. [The customers angrily glare at Squidward as they begin to leave]

name: fish
dialog: April Fools... jerk. [All the customers storm out the door in disgust as Squidward starts to look upset by their reaction]

name: Squidward
dialog: Wait, don't go!

name: Man
dialog: Hey, you stink!

name: Squidward
dialog: Wait, wait, wait, it was a joke! Uh-huh... [looks around at the mess he has made and winces, then he looks at Bubble Bass, who has a hole in his bottom due to the "prank" and Squidward starts to feel ashamed of himself] Why is it whenever I'm having fun, it's wrong? I didn't mean to make him cry. I guess this means I'd better tell SpongeBob I'm sor-eaach. [makes silly face] Huh? I guess this means I'd better apolo- [throat goes haywire] gii! This is gonna be tougher than I thought. [bubble transition to Squidward going to SpongeBob's pineapple; he knocks on SpongeBob's door] SpongeBob? Uh, SpongeBob, come out! I've got something to tell you! SpongeBob? [notices a Krusty Krab hat and goes over there to talk to the man who is wearing it] Uhh, I was thinking about today and uh… and it just seems that I may owe you some sort of… This isn't something I normally do, so, listen carefully SpongeBob, because I am about to tell you that I'm... What? [notices that the guy with the hat on is Patrick] Patrick?! What are you doing here?!

name: Patrick
dialog: Digging.

name: Squidward
dialog: Why are you wearing that hat?

name: Patrick
dialog: Oh, I don't know. [takes off the hat]

name: Squidward
dialog: [growls] Where's SpongeBob?

name: Patrick
dialog: He's in the house. He's impressed.

name: Squidward
dialog: With what?

name: Patrick
dialog: I don't know, but it must've been pretty good to make him cry like that.

name: Squidward
dialog: [shivers then goes back to SpongeBob's house] SpongeBob, SpongeBob, let me in there! [tries to turn the handle, but SpongeBob's arm comes from under the door and pulls it inside; Squidward grabs his clarinet] SpongeBob, you'd better let me in there! I don't want to have to use this! [plays clarinet horribly. SpongeBob opens the door]

name: SpongeBob
dialog: What do you want?

name: Squidward
dialog: SpongeBob, I just want to say that I'm sorr-yyyy. [sticks out tongue while talking]

name: SpongeBob
dialog: What?

name: Squidward
dialog: I'm trying to say I'm [turns into a donkey and starts braying] haw-hee-haw!

name: SpongeBob
dialog: What?!

name: Squidward
dialog: I'm just trying to say I'm... [voice muffled after his head explodes] There's gotta be an easier way to do this. [bubble transition to Squidward writing a note; he puts it in a bottle and rolls it to SpongeBob where he picks it up] Well, aren't you going to open it?

name: SpongeBob
dialog: I can't. I don't have a bottle opener.

name: Squidward
dialog: Doh! [Squidward hands SpongeBob a can and Squidward drives to the other side of the road] SpongeBob, I'm... [whispers into the can, then puts the can up to his ear but hears some sort of noise; Patrick is flossing his teeth with the cord; Squidward growls and throws the binoculars down on the ground] SpongeBob, all I am trying to say is that I am... [waves tentacles in the air and bubbles form, puts a big bubble on his head and then talks] ...sorry. [pops the bubble] There you go.

name: SpongeBob
dialog: But I couldn't... [Squidward slams the door in his face]

name: Squidward
dialog: I don't care! I said it! My conscience is clear! [Starts to walk away, when an image of Patrick appears in the air]

name: Patrick
dialog: Must've been pretty good to make him cry like that. [Squidward nervously continues walking and runs into a ghost image of a guy at the Krusty Krab]

name: Tom
dialog: April Fools... jerk. [Squidward frantically starts running again, but this time his mother appears]

name: Tentacles
dialog: [male voice] You stink!

name: Squidward
dialog: Mother?! [runs back to SpongeBob's house to apologize] All right, all right! I'm sorry, I'm sorry! I admit it, I'm sorry! I didn't mean to hurt you, in fact, SpongeBob, I like you! I like living next door, I like hearing your foghorn alarm in the morning and your high-pitched giggling at night! I also like Gary, Patrick, Sandy, Mr. Krabs, and all the other people I'm forced to be in contact with! And, and, and, and... [SpongeBob opens the door slightly]

name: SpongeBob
dialog: Squidward! Is all that true?

name: Squidward
dialog: Yes, yes, SpongeBob. Yes, it's all true.

name: SpongeBob
dialog: Even the part about the lima beans and the car chase?

name: Squidward
dialog: What the...? Yes, yes, whatever! But you have to promise not to tell anybody.

name: SpongeBob
dialog: I promise.

name: Squidward
dialog: Really? [SpongeBob opens the door all the way, revealing the citizens of Bikini Bottom inside]

name: Everyone
dialog: April Fools!

name: Squidward
dialog: [eye twitches] April Fools! You're right, April Fools! I just fooled you all! [laughs hysterically while going back into his house]

name: SpongeBob
dialog: What would we do without Squidward?

name: Narrator
dialog: Ah, Goo Lagoon, a luxurious oasis of sand and sea. [scene cuts to SpongeBob and Sandy next to a tent]

name: Sandy
dialog: Shee-oot, SpongeBob. How are we gonna go swimming when you're in a shirt and tie?

name: SpongeBob
dialog: Ah, yes. How foolish of me. [cackles] Allow me to remedy said situation right now. I will just use this changing tent here to change into my bathing suit. [goes into the tent, then pokes his head out] And I won't do anything else. [puts his head back in]

name: Sandy
dialog: SpongeBob's acting jumpier than a rattlesnake in a pickle barrel. Wait... what?

name: SpongeBob
dialog: [laughs] Oh, I'll be changing, alright, but not into a bathing suit. Wait until Sandy sees that I brought my karate gear! Hi-yah! [puts on his headgear that was in the bag] Hi-yah! [puts on his karate gloves that was in the bag] Sandy won't beat me this time, because I've got the elements on my side. The elements of surprise. Hi-yah! [kicks the bag]

name: Sandy
dialog: SpongeBob, are you ready?

name: SpongeBob
dialog: Yes, Sandy, I most certainly am ready! [softly] Ready to get it on. [jumps out of the tent towards Sandy] Hi...

name: Sandy
dialog: Hi-yah! [kicks SpongeBob in his mouth] Look, SpongeBob, we both brought our karate gear.

name: SpongeBob
dialog: [muffled laughter] Great minds think alike, I suppose.

name: Sandy
dialog: Hi-yah! [karate chops him into the air. SpongeBob crashes into the ground, followed by his pants, socks, and shoes. He stands up with the clothing on his head and feet in some food]

name: SpongeBob
dialog: I may be down, but I'm not out! [looks down at his wiggly toes, which are in some potato salad at a family picnic]

name: Tom
dialog: Way to go, buddy. It took us three days to make that potato salad. [SpongeBob jumps away] Three days!

name: SpongeBob
dialog: [jumps into an empty area] Hi-yah! Sandy?

name: Sandy
dialog: Oh, I'm Sandy, alright. [her arms come out of the ground and squish SpongeBob's face] I'm very Sandy. [kicks SpongeBob into the air] Hi-yah!

name: SpongeBob
dialog: Oh, I get it. She's "Sandy." That's her name; she's also covered in... yes! [flies out of the water then back into it. Scene cuts to Sandy talking to an ice cream vendor]

name: Sandy
dialog: Back in Texas, we call ice cream "frozen cow juice". Excuse me for a sec. Hi-yah! [slaps SpongeBob in the face with her karate glove] Thank you.

name: Vendor
dialog: No, no, thank you.

name: Sandy
dialog: Hi-yah! [slaps SpongeBob again, sending him into the air and flying into a strong fish that is waiting in line]

name: Sandy
dialog: Hey, what's everybody waiting in line for?

name: SpongeBob
dialog: Ew. [a fish is screaming while flying out of the Salty Spitoon]

name: Sandy
dialog: Looks like a rip-snortin' good time, SpongeBob!

name: SpongeBob
dialog: Yeah, let's go in.

name: Reg
dialog: [lets a fish walk in] Go ahead. [line moves up] Welcome to the Salty Spitoon. How tough are ya?

name: Reg
dialog: Yeah, so?

name: Reg
dialog: Uhh, right this way, sorry to keep you waiting. [tough fish walks in. Sandy walks up to Reg] Welcome to the Salty Spitoon. How tough are ya?

name: Sandy
dialog: How tough am I? [rips off one of his tattoos that says "MOM" and puts it upside down back where it was. Reg screams in pain when Sandy rips off the tattoo]

name: SpongeBob
dialog: Wow.

name: Sandy
dialog: Got any more tattoos? [Reg covers the upside down tattoo with his arms]

name: Reg
dialog: Uhh, that won't be necessary. Go ahead.

name: Sandy
dialog: Thanks. See ya inside, SpongeBob! [walks in]

name: Reg
dialog: How tough are ya?

name: SpongeBob
dialog: How tough am I? You got a new bottle of ketchup?

name: Reg
dialog: Sure. [hands the bottle of ketchup to SpongeBob]

name: SpongeBob
dialog: It's on! [strains to open it, but he can't, takes a few breathes, tries to open the ketchup bottle again, but same result, then gives up] If I could just run this under some hot water...

name: Reg
dialog: Get outta here. This place is too tough for you, little man.

name: SpongeBob
dialog: Too tough for me? That's downright ridiculous. I'll have you know I stubbed my toe last week while watering my spice garden, and I only cried for twenty minutes.

name: Reg
dialog: Listen, kid. I think you'd be more comfortable over at that place. [points to the building across the street]

name: SpongeBob
dialog: Weenie Hut Jr's? Are you saying I belong in Weenie Hut Jr's?

name: Reg
dialog: Uhh. Oh, no, sorry, I was actually pointing at the place next to it. [points to another building]

name: SpongeBob
dialog: Super Weenie Hut Jr's?

name: Reg
dialog: Yeah. Unless you think you're tough enough to fight me. [Scene cuts to SpongeBob sitting in a seat at Weenie Hut Jr's]

name: SpongeBob
dialog: [snorts] What weenies. Oh, brother.

name: Robot
dialog: [robotic voice] Would you care for another diet cola with a lemon twist, weenie?

name: SpongeBob
dialog: What? But I'm not a weenie! [the robot scans SpongeBob with one of its scanners]

name: Robot
dialog: I'm sorry, sir, but my sensors indicate that you are indeed a weenie. [computer beeps and shows a picture of a hot dog weenie with the word "YES" below it]

name: SpongeBob
dialog: That's impossible! [the two nerds look at him. He runs off]

name: Robot
dialog: You can't hide what's inside!

name: SpongeBob
dialog: [runs over to Reg] I demand entrance into your club on the grounds that I am not a weenie! [a strong, orange fish walks up]

name: Reg
dialog: You were sayin'? [to orange fish] Go ahead, buddy.

name: SpongeBob
dialog: So, your name's Reg?

name: Reg
dialog: [throws SpongeBob aside] Would you get outta here?

name: SpongeBob
dialog: Mark my words, Reg. I will get into the Salty Spitoon! I will! [runs off. Scene cuts to Weenie Hut Jr's]

name: Robot
dialog: I believe he said something about going to the wig store.

name: Drifter
dialog: What's shakin', my man?

name: Reg
dialog: Not much. Say, haven't I seen you before?

name: Drifter
dialog: Doubt it — I'm a drifter — just blew into town. Heard your club was pretty tough, thought I'd check it out.

name: Reg
dialog: Nice try, kid. I know it's you.

name: Drifter
dialog: What're you talking about? [Reg pulls Drifter's hair, but it is still attached to his head, it's real hair]

name: Reg
dialog: Aha! [the hair does not come off. SpongeBob walks up with a clown wig on]

name: SpongeBob
dialog: Hey, everybody, what's goin' on? [the Drifter gets angry as Reg tries to redo his hair, but can't do it]

name: Reg
dialog: Ah, you can go in. Sorry about that. [Drifter angrily walks in] Well, what do you want?

name: SpongeBob
dialog: I'd like to gain entrance to your social club, please. I believe my hairdo is in order. [Reg takes the wig off SpongeBob's head. SpongeBob laughs nervously] So, uh, where do you stand on the whole bald vs. shaved debate? [a big, green fish walks up with a tattoo of a seahorse on his right arm]

name: Reg
dialog: Alright, now it's a party! Oh, yeah, check out the new ink.

name: Reg
dialog: [chuckles] Yeah. Hey, what about that one? [the big, green fish looks at his left arm that has a SpongeBob tattoo on it]

name: Reg
dialog: Can you make it dance?

name: SpongeBob
dialog: Ha-cha-cha-cha, ha-cha-cha-cha, ha-chattity-chattity-cha!

name: Reg
dialog: Hmmm, wait a minute. [rips SpongeBob off his arm] Go ahead in. [the tattoo fish walks in, rubbing his left arm]

name: Reg
dialog: Nice try, little man. [throws SpongeBob to the back of the line behind two strong fish]

name: Reg
dialog: Hold it, you two! That's enough, you're both plenty tough, go ahead in.

name: SpongeBob
dialog: Hey, what about me? I was in that scrap. [He dusts his clothes using his hands]

name: Reg
dialog: [chortles] I saw you runnin'. When you get in a real fight, then we'll talk.

name: SpongeBob
dialog: Well, then, I guess it's time to take it up a notch. [spins his legs, then his hands, and then cracks his fingers, but they are snapped in half. The scene cuts out to SpongeBob's broken fingers. He starts to cry and runs off. Scene cuts to SpongeBob with his fingers in a bowl of ice cream, whimpering]

name: Robot
dialog: Care for another sundae, weenie?

name: SpongeBob
dialog: [jumps angrily] I am not a weenie!

name: SpongeBob
dialog: My friends don't hang out at Weenie Hut Jr's. [scroll over to Patrick in the seat next to him]

name: Patrick
dialog: You tell 'em, SpongeBob! [sips his drink]

name: SpongeBob
dialog: Patrick, what're you doing here?

name: Patrick
dialog: I'm always here on Double Weenie Wednesdays.

name: Patrick
dialog: Oh, so it's Mega Weenie Monday?

name: Patrick
dialog: Barnacles!

name: SpongeBob
dialog: I don't have time for this! I've got to go pick a fight with a muscular stranger! It's the only way of getting into the Salty Spitoon! [begins to walks out]

name: Patrick
dialog: No, SpongeBob, you can't. It's too dangerous.

name: SpongeBob
dialog: I've got no choice.

name: Robot
dialog: I have a suggestion. Why not fake a fight?

name: Patrick
dialog: Hey, that's not a bad idea! You can call me a couple of bad names, we rumble, next thing you know, you're in the Salty Spitoon.

name: SpongeBob
dialog: Well, I guess I've got nothing to lose. Let's do it!

name: Patrick
dialog: Yeah! [both run out]

name: Robot
dialog: I am a robot, not a miracle worker. [scene cuts to SpongeBob walking up to Reg]

name: SpongeBob
dialog: Afternoon, Reg.

name: Reg
dialog: Whoa, whoa, little man. You still can't go in.

name: SpongeBob
dialog: Well, that makes me pretty mad.

name: Reg
dialog: Oh, yeah?

name: SpongeBob
dialog: Yeah. I might have to beat someone up just to get rid of all this blind fury.

name: Reg
dialog: [sarcastically] Wow.

name: SpongeBob
dialog: Yeah, I feel pretty sorry for the next guy who looks at me funny.

name: Reg
dialog: Hmmm... what about that guy? [points to a large muscular fish behind him]

name: SpongeBob
dialog: [gasps and stammers] I, uh... [laughs] don't be silly. He's not botherin' anybody. I mean, not like... that guy! [points to Patrick]

name: Patrick
dialog: Who, me? [SpongeBob walks up to Patrick]

name: SpongeBob
dialog: Yeah, you. Standing there all smiling and whatnot. Somebody oughta teach you some manners!

name: Patrick
dialog: Okay, but I must warn you. I happen to be a world championship... uhh... [looks at his hand, which has writing on it] ...kickboxer. [winks and gives a thumbs-up to SpongeBob]

name: SpongeBob
dialog: I don't care if you're the demon seed of Davy Jones! You're goin' down, Tubby! [Patrick starts to tear up]

name: Patrick
dialog: Tubby? [Patrick's sadness is quickly replaced by fury and he turns red and snarls with rage] Grr! Nobody calls me Tubby! [angrily punches SpongeBob in the eye, leaving a black mark]

name: SpongeBob
dialog: Wait, Patrick, you're supposed to let me win, remember?

name: Patrick
dialog: Oh yeah. [invisible punches flying] No, please wait. [grunting as more invisible punches hit him and an elephant sound is heard when Patrick's head is hit. Patrick is being thrown into the air and on the ground, then given a wedgie] No, please, have mercy! [Patrick is kicked into the background]

name: Reg
dialog: Wow! You destroyed that guy without even touchin' him. [Patrick is still getting beaten in the background]

name: SpongeBob
dialog: I did?

name: Reg
dialog: I never thought I'd say this, but go ahead in.

name: SpongeBob
dialog: Really? I can go in? Oh, my gosh, I never thought this moment would come! I, SpongeBob SquarePants, am tough enough to get into the Salty Spitoon! This is the happiest day of my life! [walks in as Reg smiles. Scene cuts to an ambulance driving down the street with SpongeBob in bandages and Sandy by his side] Sandy? [groans] What happened?

name: Sandy
dialog: You ran inside and slipped on an ice cube. [ambulance arrives at the hospital. Scene cuts to Sandy wheeling SpongeBob on a gurney in front of the doctor]

name: Doctor
dialog: What happened?

name: SpongeBob
dialog: I slipped on an ice cube and got covered in boo-boos!

name: Doctor
dialog: Boo-boos, eh? Hmmm... I think you guys want that hospital. [points across the street to Weenie Hut General]

name: SpongeBob
dialog: Weenie Hut General?!

name: Fran
dialog: Squidward, we love you!

name: Squidward
dialog: Alright, alright. Time for another hideous day at work. Ahh, just hang in there, gorgeous. [Plays a few notes on his clarinet] Your star will shine at the clarinet recital tomorrow. [laughs]

name: SpongeBob
dialog: Time for another glorious day at work. [winks at his tie, the tie winks back] Good morning, Squidward! [walks down the street with Squidward] And isn't it a lovely morning? Why are you playing the clarinet on your way to work?

name: Squidward
dialog: I'm practicing for my clarinet recital. Soon, all of Bikini Bottom will recognize the talent that is Squidward Tentacles. Goodbye, SpongeBoob.

name: SpongeBob
dialog: See ya at the Krusty Krab, Squidwart. Hey, Sandy, what's this?

name: Sandy
dialog: Well, this here is my new matter transporter. It can move things from one place to another in the blink of an eye.

name: SpongeBob
dialog: Ooh, that sounds fancy.

name: Sandy
dialog: Let me show you how it works. [puts an apple in the transporter]

name: SpongeBob
dialog: Whoa! [apple disappears] Where'd it go?

name: Sandy
dialog: Just where you think it would be. [apple appears on Mrs. Puff's desk]

name: Puff
dialog: Oh!

name: SpongeBob
dialog: Uh-oh, I'm late for work. Do you think your machine can zap me over to the Krusty Krab?

name: Sandy
dialog: I always did want to try a critter. Sure, why not? Get in there, SpongeBob.

name: SpongeBob
dialog: Whoo-hoo! [goes into transporter]

name: Sandy
dialog: Hold on tight.

name: SpongeBob
dialog: [transporter starts] Gee, Sandy, this sure feels...

name: Squidward
dialog: [walking up to the Krusty Krab] Well, here we go again. [as he reaches for the door, SpongeBob appears and Squidward's arm is attached through SpongeBob's body]

name: SpongeBob
dialog: Hey, Squidward! [laughs. Sandy's remote is going haywire]

name: Sandy
dialog: What's going on with this thing? [SpongeBob and Squidward get transported back to Sandy's machine] What in tarnation? [gasps. SpongeBob and Squidward are mutated into one body]

name: SpongeBob
dialog: Hi, Sandy!

name: Squidward
dialog: I'm not sure what it is, but something seems different about me.

name: SpongeBob
dialog: Yeah, me too.

name: Squidward
dialog: Hey, what are you doing with my hand? What am I doing with your hand? Ahh! What is this? We're all mixed up together. [tries to detach himself, but fails] This is horrible! I have my clarinet recital tomorrow!

name: SpongeBob
dialog: Oh, it's not so bad, Squidward. Now we can be best buddies and do everything together, forever.

name: Squidward
dialog: [screams] Sandy, was this your doing? You've got to get us separated!

name: Sandy
dialog: Well, I wish I knew how.

name: Squidward
dialog: Well, you have to do something! I can't stay stuck to him!

name: Sandy
dialog: Hmmm, I wonder what would happen if I tried zapping you back in the transporter.

name: Squidward
dialog: Uhh, yeah, yeah, yeah, good idea. Let's try it.

name: Sandy
dialog: Well, here goes nothing. [transports to Bikini Bottom Elementary]

name: Mable
dialog: All right, children. Today's Timmy's birthday. You know what that means. Ready, Timmy? [opens present. SpongeBob and Squidward rise up from the box, still mutated together. Mable screams as SpongeBob and Squidward get transported again]

name: Doctor
dialog: Congratulations, Mrs. Smith. You gave birth to a healthy baby boy.

name: Smith
dialog: May I see my baby?

name: Doctor
dialog: Of course. [baby appears as SpongeBob & Squidward mutated into one body again. Mrs. Smith screams as they are transported again]

name: Monster
dialog: I've been in love with you ever since I first laid my eye on you. [both monsters kiss. SpongeBob and Squidward appear between them] Hey, baby, what's your name? [SpongeBob and Squidward get transported again. The lady monster slaps the one-eyed monster's face and leaves]

name: Squidward
dialog: It's no use, Sandy. We're still the same.

name: Sandy
dialog: Well, that's a darn shame. You know what, I was working on the blueprints for a new invention. But it's still in the embryonic stage.

name: Squidward
dialog: Try anything! I cannot go to my clarinet recital like this.

name: Sandy
dialog: I'll continue working on it. In the meantime, you boys keep your head up.

name: SpongeBob
dialog: Together forever.

name: Squidward
dialog: Misery. [later, SpongeBob and Squidward are riding a bike to work] SpongeBob, hasn't anyone taught you how to ride a bike?

name: SpongeBob
dialog: Don't worry, I'll drive.

name: Squidward
dialog: [Squidward's head bumps against the wheel of the bike] Ow, ow, ow. SpongeBob! Ow, ow, ow, ow, ow. [both enter the Krusty Krab riding the bike. The bike crashes into the boat and they fly through the kitchen window]

name: Krabs
dialog: [enters kitchen] What in blazes is going on in here?

name: SpongeBob
dialog: Oh, hi, Mr. Krabs.

name: Krabs
dialog: What are you two doing laying around? Get to work.

name: Squidward
dialog: If you say so. [as they stand up, Mr. Krabs freaks out]

name: Krabs
dialog: Egad! What happened to ya? Uhh, I don't want to know. Just go do your jobs.

name: SpongeBob
dialog: Aye aye, cap'n!

name: Squidward
dialog: Do you have to be such an accommodating buffoon?

name: SpongeBob
dialog: Squidward, everybody knows I'm a sponge. I look nothing like a balloon.

name: Squidward
dialog: I don't have time for this. I've got to man the cash register. [stretches his head through the kitchen window] Whew. Can I help you?

name: Squidward
dialog: SpongeBob, I need two Krabby Patties.

name: SpongeBob
dialog: Two Krabby Patties coming right up. [notices the buns are out of reach] I can't... reach the buns.

name: Krabs
dialog: SpongeBob, what's the holdup?!

name: SpongeBob
dialog: Sorry, Mr. Krabs. I'm on it.

name: Krabs
dialog: Time is money, boy.

name: SpongeBob
dialog: Time is money. Right. [reaches bun] Hello, bun. At last we meet. [Squidward can't hold the cash register. His head flies through the kitchen window, onto the grill and crashes into SpongeBob] And now for the-

name: Krabs
dialog: Alright, that's it. I can't afford you jeopardizing me business. You two are more trouble than you're worth. [pushes them out the restaurant] And don't come back until you get this problem sorted out.

name: SpongeBob
dialog: Look on the bright side, Squidward. At least we still have each other.

name: Squidward
dialog: That's how we got into this predicament in the first place, you imbecile! Now if you'll excuse me, I'd like a moment of peace. [plays clarinet as they walk past a surfer]

name: Surfer
dialog: Whoa, rock on, freaky bro!

name: Squidward
dialog: Sandy! Sandy! Please tell me you've figured out a way to separate us.

name: Sandy
dialog: Say hello to the 'Molecular Separator Ray'.

name: Squidward
dialog: Hello, Molecular Separator Ray. Well, let's get on with it. My clarinet recital is tomorrow night.

name: Sandy
dialog: Uhh, well, I'm not quite done with it yet.

name: Squidward
dialog: What'd you say?

name: Sandy
dialog: I'm still putting it together. At best I'll have it ready, uhh, the day after tomorrow? Maybe? [Squidward pushes Sandy's air helmet]

name: Squidward
dialog: What?!? Day after tomorrow?! No, No, No, No, No, No, No, No, No! I have a performance tomorrow! I can't be stuck to that yellow freak! [SpongeBob smiles] Sandy, please, you've got to do it before the show!

name: Sandy
dialog: Well, uhh, I suppose... I'll have it ready before you go on. [Squidward and SpongeBob stretch through their front doors, but can't walk much further, so their houses collide together]

name: Squidward
dialog: Of course. [at the clarinet recital] Oh, my. [not an empty seat in the house] Where are you, Sandy? Sandy? I can't do it. I can't go out there.

name: SpongeBob
dialog: Squidward, this is your moment. The story you will tell when you look back as a... superstar!

name: Squidward
dialog: Superstar?

name: SpongeBob
dialog: Now go out there and give them the best darn show they've ever seen!

name: Squidward
dialog: You're right! The show must go on!

name: Announcer
dialog: Ladies and gentlefish, Bikini Bottom's Community Rec Center is proud to present: Squidward Tentacles. [curtain rises to Squidward wearing a big cape like clothing. Squidward starts playing and everyone begins to hate it]

name: Evelyn
dialog: Honey, I'm scared. [the crowd continues to dislike Squidward playing the clarinet, the cape comes off as a nail tears it. SpongeBob starts to see the crowd, the crowd gasps]

name: SpongeBob
dialog: Uhh, hi.

name: Wobbles
dialog: Whoa. Rock on, freaky bro! Yeah. Whoo! [crowd cheers]

name: SpongeBob
dialog: Wow, they really liked it.

name: Krabs
dialog: [laughing] There you go, Squiddy!

name: Squidward
dialog: They... they... they're cheering. Superstardom. This must be what it feels like. This is what it looks like. What it [starts to laugh happily] sounds like. And... [smells the air] ...what it smells like. Oh, simply intoxicating.

name: Sandy
dialog: Whoo-wee, there you boys are. Looks like I'm just in time.

name: Squidward
dialog: Sandy?

name: Sandy
dialog: One blast of this Molecular Separator Ray and you'll be separated for good. [SpongeBob and Squidward try to tell Sandy not to blast them, but was too late, she blasts the ray at Squidward and SpongeBob and it separates them. Crowd gasps]

name: Squidward
dialog: [SpongeBob gives him back his clarinet] Hmph. [plays clarinet off-key making SpongeBob cheer for him, but the audience hates it as they block their ears, Old Man Jenkins faints off his chair]

name: Mary
dialog: I think I'm going to be sick! [Squidward blows his clarinet at Billy, which blows his skin off and shows his skeleton]

name: Billy
dialog: Ah, I'm out of here!

name: Squidward
dialog: Huh, no, wait. Wait! [everyone leaves] Oh, my one moment of fame... gone. [grabs the Molecular Separator Ray] There's got to be some way to reverse this. [pushes the button over and over]

name: Sandy
dialog: No, Squidward! That's a very sensitive device!

name: SpongeBob
dialog: Squidward, I wouldn't--! [laser blasts into the final scene]

name: Therapist
dialog: So, what seems to be the problem, Mr. Tentacles?

name: Squidward
dialog: It all started when I was born. [camera zooms out to show Patrick, Sandy, Mr. Krabs, Mrs. Puff, Pearl, SpongeBob, and Squidward deformed and misshapen into a liquid ball of the fused characters]

name: Krabs
dialog: [The scene goes back to the Krusty Krab where it shows SpongeBob in a Superhero-like costume (not his Mermaid Man Costume) at the register and Mr. Krabs holding a bag of Money] Gotta hand it to ya, boy. [The image changes to just show Mr. Krabs with the money] Gettin' Mermaid Man and Barnacle Boy to shoot for me restaurant was a stroke of genius.

name: SpongeBob
dialog: [The images changes back to show both of them. Mr. Krabs walks away.] All in the line of duty, Mr. Krabs. [Squidward crawls over to the register with a torn uniform. He is groaning] Isn't it great, Squidward?

name: Squidward
dialog: Great? [He looks and points in the opposite direction of SpongeBob] Those little savages tried to kill me.

name: SpongeBob
dialog: Yeah, but it's so worth it when you get to work in these. [shows his uniform which consists of red underwear and a disguise mask around his eyes, and you hear a five-note poorly played trumpet fanfare]

name: Plankton
dialog: [The scene returns to the Chum Bucket and Plankton still looking through his periscope] Stupid kid. Wait a minute, what's this? [The scene returns to the Krusty Krab where it shows Karen and Mr. Krabs talking and laughing (Plankton's voice is blocking what they say)] Karen? [The image changes to show (through the Krusty Krab window) the exterior of the Chum Bucket with Plankton's Periscope, which shows his eye] My own wife?! [The scene changes to show Plankton inside the chum bucket; the door is also shown] Oh, how Krabs mocks me. [He pushes his periscope back up]

name: Karen
dialog: [opens doors to Chum Bucket] Hi, honey.

name: Plankton
dialog: [He turns around] What's that? A souvenir from your boyfriend Krabs?

name: Karen
dialog: [The image changes to show Karen's face] Oh, pipe down. I just went to get you this [The image changes to show [Plankton looking mad and Karen's hand putting down the Kids Meal box] happy hero box.

name: Plankton
dialog: Wha...?! [jumps on top of the box] Thanks, babe. You're too good to me. [opens the box and gasps] A Mermaid Man action figure...And a Barnacle Boy eraser?! [Jumps down and plays with the toys] Look at me. I'm Barnacle Boy. Look at me. I'm Mermaid Man. [The scene pans out to show Mr. Krabs on the box] Krabs! [hits the side of the box with Krabs' picture on it with his new toys while laughing. He jumps on top of the box and continues to laugh. He jumps off of it. The crushed box is shown.] Sure! Why didn't I think of this before? If Mermaid Man and Barnacle Boy can build Krabs up, they can tear him down, too. [maniacal laughter. The scene changes to show the exterior of Shady Shoals Rest Home. Snoring can be heard. The scene changes to show the bottom of Mermaid Man and Barnacle Boy's room door. The snoring continues] Ding dong. [door opens. Plankton is wearing a plaid, yellow shirt, a red bow tie, and a boater hat with a yellow stripe] Hello, boys. [Mermaid Man and Barnacle Boy are the ones snoring, they wake up]

name: Boy
dialog: What? What? What?

name: Plankton
dialog: I'm Down Here, Fellas!

name: Man
dialog: Who are you?

name: Plankton
dialog: [Hops onto Mermaid Man's foot] Oh, Professor Plankton, Door-to-door salesman. [gets out a card] My card.

name: Man
dialog: [takes card and reads it] "Professor Plankton's Personal Products?"

name: Plankton
dialog: Say, you two look like a couple of ladies' men, am I right? [An ugly image of Mermaid Man and Barnacle Boy is seen. A scream and glass breaking can be heard.] I knew it! Just look at that heroic chin. [Barnacle Boy's chin has zits and bumps in it and you hear a horse neigh] Those chiseled features. [Mermaid Man's ears has hair growing out of it and zits all over and you hear a monkey scream] That bra. [An elephant is heard. He then jumps to his neck.] But what's this? Dandruff?

name: Man
dialog: I've got dandruff?

name: Plankton
dialog: You sure do. [pours laundry soap around his neck] See?

name: Man
dialog: Oh, my! [looks at soap]

name: Plankton
dialog: [He goes over to Barnacle Boy's head and lifts up Barnacle Boy's hat but sees there is real dandruff under there. The scene zooms in and shows the dandruff in more detail and snow bells jingling is heard] Ew! [He then moves back to Mermaid Man's foot] Couple of studs like you can't go around like this. Lucky for you, Dr. Plankton's come prepared with "Plankton's Dandruff Control Shampoo". A little of this stuff and the ladies will be breakin' down your door.

name: Boy
dialog: [Barnacle Boy pulls a lever which moves their couch back until it is flat] Sign us up, Professor.

name: Plankton
dialog: [He moves to the now-flat back of the couch between both Mermaid Man and Barnacle Boy] Wise decision, gentlemen. [rubs the shampoo into both of their scalps while humming happily] Hey, what do we have here? You fellas look a little peaked. [both are now under Plankton's control] Hmm, this shouldn't be. I wonder. [tears off the dandruff tag a little on the shampoo bottle] Say, this isn't Professor Plankton's Dandruff Control Shampoo! It's Professor Plankton's [Pulls of the rest of the tag] Mind Control Shampoo! [laughs] With conditioner. Time to prepare for your next role, fellas, as my zombies! [laughs. The scene changes, through a card that says "Wipe!", to the Krusty Krab where there is a gigantic line outside and giant Mermaid Man and Barnacle Boy balloons above the building]

name: Kids

dialog: How interesting.
