dialog: [there is fire everywhere] And another thing ve Vikings like to do is appropriate. [pulls on the cash register until the wires snap, and throws it on the ship]

name: SpongeBob
dialog: What a fascinating culture.

name: Viking
dialog: And on occasion,... the Vikings... [pulls out a rope] ve've been known to liberate. [ties Squidward up with the rope]

name: Squidward
dialog: What the?! Hey! You can't do [gets thrown onto the ship] [screams] tha!

name: SpongeBob
dialog: [tied up by a rope] I can't believe how much I'm learning.

name: Krabs
dialog: Squidward, I'll be back in one hour. I'm going on my lunch break. [sees the fire] Squidward?

name: Squidward
dialog: Would you mind telling us what this is all about?

name: Viking
dialog: [spitting] Shes. [P.S. He started to say sure, but changed to yes] Now that you're part of our crew,... I guess we should introduce ourselves. [punches a Viking on the chest] This is Olaf. [slaps a Viking on the chest] And this is Olaf. [points to a Viking] And this is Olaf. [points to a Viking] This... is Olaf, Olaf, Olaf, Olaf, And... um... [covers his eyes and snaps his fingers]

name: Viking
dialog: Olaf.

name: Viking
dialog: Olaf.

name: Squidward
dialog: So, let me guess. Your name must be...

name: Viking
dialog: That's right. Gordon.

name: SpongeBob
dialog: Nice to meet ya.

name: Gordon
dialog: Now. Before I put you two to werk, I wanna know what...

name: SpongeBob
dialog: Wait! I still have lots more questions about the Vikings' way of life.

name: Gordon
dialog: Like what?

name: SpongeBob
dialog: Well, like... what do the Vikings like to do for fun?

name: Gordon
dialog: Hm... fun. Um, um, um, uh, well,...

name: Olaf
dialog: What about the Shield Toss?

name: Gordon
dialog: Oh, yeah. Yeah, yeah. [grabs a shield and throws it at a door]

name: SpongeBob
dialog: Anything else?

name: Gordon
dialog: Um...

name: Olaf
dialog: Oh! What about Flaming Shield Toss?

name: Gordon
dialog: Oh, yeah. Yeah. Yeah. [grabs another shield, lights it on fire with a torch, and throws it at the door]

name: Olafs
dialog: [clap]

name: SpongeBob
dialog: Anything else?

name: Vikings
dialog: [think]

name: Gordon
dialog: Eh, I, I, I can't really think of anything.

name: Olaf
dialog: Me neither. Oh, yeah!

name: Gordon
dialog: What is it, Olaf?

name: Olaf
dialog: We like to sing songs.

name: Olaf
dialog: Ooh... No we don't!

name: Olaf
dialog: [being carried away] Wait! No! Okay, I admit it was a lousy idea! I promise it won't happen again! [gets thrown into a catapult]

name: Gordon
dialog: You got that right.

name: Olaf
dialog: [gets launched by the catapult. He screams, and splashes into the ocean]

name: Gordon
dialog: Any other questions?

name: SpongeBob
dialog: [stunned] I'll let you know if I think of anything.

name: Gordon
dialog: So. Tell me. Vhat is it that you two know how to do?

name: SpongeBob
dialog: Well, Mr. Krabs tells me I'm pretty good with a spatula.

name: Squidward
dialog: Ha.

name: Gordon
dialog: Quiet. You're our ship's new head chef. And... vhat can you do?

name: Squidward
dialog: Well, if you must know, I'm a widely renowned clarinet virtuoso, state-recognized interior design consultant, licensed and board certified antique macrame conosuor, born and raised collector and sculptor of driftwood, and able to recognize over 13 hundred brand names of single-personed pedal operate vehicles at a single glance. Plus, I make a killer Soufflé.

name: Gordon
dialog: Impressive. You'll be the ship's bathroom attendant.

name: SpongeBob
dialog: A Promotion. Congratulations, Squidward!

name: Squidward
dialog: [appears in front of Gordon] Hold it right there, whiskers! Let's not forget you're the one who dragged me onto this crate in the first place! Now, you ask me to pour my heart out, and this is the respect I get?! Well, you got another thing coming, honey! I want off this boat, pronto! [appears in the catapult] On second thought, bathroom attendants make me some tips. Well, look on the bright side, Squidward. No more living next door to SpongeBob. Let her rip, Jack-o!

name: SpongeBob
dialog: Wait! [stops the hammer] You can't do that.

name: Gordon
dialog: You mean to question the vill of the tribe?

name: SpongeBob
dialog: If it means saving my best friend, then yes.

name: Gordon
dialog: [throws an axe in front of SpongeBob] Well. Then pick up the weapon and fight with me a duel in accordance with the prophecy! [pulls a sword out of no where]

name: Olafs
dialog: Duel, duel, duel, duel!

name: Gordon
dialog: Go on. Pick it up!

name: SpongeBob
dialog: But.... [struggles to pick up the ax]

name: Gordon
dialog: Go on. Veakling.

name: Olaf
dialog: Heh! Owned!

name: SpongeBob
dialog: But, but I...

name: Olaf
dialog: We're being attacked by a giant monster. This is the end, uh, the end, uh, of the Vikings!

name: Olaf
dialog: Oh, Vahalla. Why have you forsaken us?

name: SpongeBob
dialog: Guys, you just ran into a piece of ice. No one's forsaken you. There's a breach in the hull over there. You just gotta patch it up.

name: Gordon
dialog: [pulls out a blanket] Quick! Everybody take one of these!

name: SpongeBob
dialog: What's that for?

name: Gordon
dialog: It's a security blanket.

name: SpongeBob
dialog: But, how ya gonna patch up a leak with that?

name: Gordon
dialog: We're not. But it makes us feel so much better.

name: Gordon
dialog: Wait! You forgot yer blanket!

name: Squidward
dialog: [still tied up in the catapult] What the barnacles is going on down there?

name: SpongeBob
dialog: Pardon me, Squidward! [breaks the rope that was tying Squidward with his spatula]

name: Squidward
dialog: [sliding down the catapult] It's all yours.

name: SpongeBob
dialog: Thanks. [lassos a mast and the catapult turns] There.

name: Olaf
dialog: Look up there! What's he doing?

name: SpongeBob
dialog: Here goes nothing! [throws his spatula at the pedal. The catapult launches him into the breech in the hull.. The ship straightens up, the vikings cheer]

name: SpongeBob
dialog: Now that's what I call a Viking-sized adventure!

name: SpongeBob
dialog: ♪Someday, I'm going to make you sweetie. Not overtly, but sur-rep-titious-ly.♪ Drum solo! [uses spatula as drum sticks] ♪Dooga, dooga, dooga, dooga, dooga—doo. Doo, doo, doo, Doo. Doo!♪ Hey, looks like you guys and gals are done. [flips all the patties into the air then uses one of his special helmet gadgets to squirt ketchup and mustard on the patties. When the patties fall, they land on a bun that SpongeBob is holding. He then deals out the lettuce, cheese, and tomatoes as if they were cards to the six patties] In all my years of fry cookery, I have never seen such a lovely group of patties. Especially— you. [points to a patty with lettuce for hair, tomatoes for eyes, a pickle for a nose, ketchup for rosy cheeks and mustard for a smile] Such perfection from your little lettuce hair to your rosy ketchup cheeks right down to your mustard smile. May I call you— Patty?

name: Squidward
dialog: SpongeBob, I need that order of six.

name: SpongeBob
dialog: Here you go, Squidward. One, two, three and four, and uh— five and six. [only gives Squidward five patties] That's it. That's the whole order, Squidward. There isn't a Krabby Patty behind my back or anything. [laughs]

name: Squidward
dialog: Uh— yeah.

name: SpongeBob
dialog: Oh, Patty, a patty like you comes around once in a lifetime. I can't let them eat you. No, the job must come first. I can't let emotions cloud my commitment to the sacred fry cook oath: "That which is fried, must be eaten."

name: Squidward
dialog: SpongeBob, where is that other— oh, there it is. [takes the patty to the table. SpongeBob looks out the kitchen door to see three muscular guys sitting at the table, in which two of them are eating patties while the other one doesn't have one]

name: Squidward
dialog: Right here, muscleboy.

name: SpongeBob
dialog: [screams and grabs the patty] No, I won't let you do this to Patty.

name: Squidward
dialog: SpongeBob, hand over the Krabby—

name: SpongeBob
dialog: [sitting under the grill] Oh, Patty, I can't let them eat you. Your beauty must be preserved. [opens up the patty] Amazing.

name: Squidward
dialog: [snickering] What are you going to do with it, take it home? Put a little dress on her? Go out for a romantic walk with it? [continues snickering]

name: SpongeBob
dialog: Great idea. [runs off]

name: Squidward
dialog: [sighs] I wonder if it's too late to get a refund from my therapist.

name: SpongeBob
dialog: [gives a Krabby Patty to Muscular Guy #1] Enjoy, sir.

name: SpongeBob
dialog: What's cooking there, Patty? Oh, are you kidding? I love crepes. Oh, Patty, when we're together, I feel like we're in our own little world like, like— nothing can hurt us. [small explosion] Fire! [alarm bell rings. SpongeBob pants] Fire! Fire!

name: Gary
dialog: [by a fire extinguisher] Meow. [puts out the fire. SpongeBob stops panting]

name: SpongeBob
dialog: It's okay, Patty, the fire's gone. You're safe now. [doorbell rings] Oh, I better, uh— get the doorbell. [opens the door]

name: Patrick
dialog: [lifts SpongeBob up] SpongeBob, how about another game of— [ties SpongeBob in a knot] tie your best buddy in knots. [lies down] My turn.

name: SpongeBob
dialog: Sorry, Patrick. [unties himself] I already made plans to go for a walk through Jellyfish Fields with Patty. As soon as the little lady dries her hair, we're heading out.

name: Sandy
dialog: Hi-yah! [karate chops door open] Hey, SpongeBob, you didn't forget about our plan to go a-choppin', did you?

name: SpongeBob
dialog: Sorry, Sandy. No time for karate today. After our walk, I'm going for a rowboat ride with Patty. Just waiting for her to put on her makeup. You know how long it takes a Krabby Patty to get ready.

name: Sandy
dialog: Well, that makes as much sense as a snake with no slither. Patties are put in the water for eating, SpongeBob. Not for beboppin' all over Timbuktu.

name: SpongeBob
dialog: [sighs] Patty. Yeah, well, you two have fun with that. [walks away] Patty and I have to be on our way.

name: Patrick
dialog: I've been replaced by a sandwich! [sobs] Maybe I could meet a lovely sandwich of my own. Yeah, that'll show SpongeBob. [walks away. cut to SpongeBob dancing with his patty and singing]

name: SpongeBob
dialog: ♪Oh, baby, They may call me a fool, But I can't help our gravitational pull. When I stuff you with cotton candy, it reminds me you're so sweet. When we go riding, it's dandy. The way you hang onto that seat, Ba-ay-ay-by!♪ [they feed the scallops some bread] ♪When I'm with you, Our love is stronger than glue.♪ Whoo! ♪Oh, baby! There isn't anything. There's nothing in the world, I wouldn't do for you—♪ [SpongeBob sees Patty gone and is being surrounded by scallops] Hey, let go of her, you Patty-eaters! No! Get away! Hi-yah! Hi-yah! [he is using karate to break the scallops] Hi-yah! Hi-yah! Hi-yah! Yah! Yah! Hi-yah! Hi-yah! Hiiiiyah! Patty, you okay, sweetoms? ♪I'm so— sorry! I'll never let you out of my sight again, And I'll always keep you out of harm's waaa-aaaa-aayyyy!♪ [SpongeBob is rowing a boat] ♪Oh, baby. Our love is so strong. That's why I'm singing this song. Ba-ay-ay-by! Your looks are sweeter than honey. From your pickles to your buns, It ain't even funny—!♪ [they fall off of a waterfall and into the river. Races for the patty] I'm coming for you! [he lifts her sunhat in which floats in the water and all her ingredients are spilled everywhere] Oh, no! Look at you! Don't worry, Patty! I'll take care of this! [he puts her back together but the patty is soggy] There you go! ♪All better. Oh, baby.♪ [cut to SpongeBob and Patty on a picnic. Patty has become rotten] Oh, Patty. Do you realize what this signifies? Mm-hmm. That's right. It's our six-hour anniversary. And do you know what that means? Are you all right, Patty? You don't seem so hot. Don't worry, I know what'll make you feel better. A dinner at the finest restaurant in Bikini Bottom. [cut to the Krusty Krab at an early evening with a vibrant pink sunset]

name: Krabs
dialog: Squidward! Where the barnacles is our fry cook? He's been gone all day. That boy's never been a work shirker. We got a crowd of hungry customers waiting.

name: Squidward
dialog: How should I know? Do I look like my idiot's keeper?

name: Krabs
dialog: Well— actually— [doors open to SpongeBob in a tux]

name: SpongeBob
dialog: Good day, sir.

name: Squidward
dialog: As if on cue.

name: Krabs
dialog: SpongeBob, what's with the fancy getup?

name: SpongeBob
dialog: Oh, I just got gussied up for my special dinner date.

name: Krabs
dialog: A dinner date? Well, blow me down, boy. I didn't know you had it in you. so when do we get to meet the little lady? [quietly] By the way, is she rich?

name: SpongeBob
dialog: She's rich in taste.

name: Squidward
dialog: How could you possibly date anyone? I mean, look at you. She must be blind. [limousine arrives]

name: Krabs
dialog: Ooh, a limousine.

name: SpongeBob
dialog: There she is.

name: Krabs
dialog: Oh, I can smell the money already.

name: SpongeBob
dialog: [carrying in Patty] Here we are, darling. The best eatery in town. [walks by a couple eating and they sniff the odor in the air]

name: Smith
dialog: Harold, again?

name: Smith
dialog: Martha, I know what you're thinking. It's not me this time.

name: Smith
dialog: Well, whatever it is, it's disgusting.

name: Smith
dialog: Let's get out of here. [they walk away]

name: Smith
dialog: Yuck.

name: SpongeBob
dialog: Mr. Krabs, Squidward— allow me to introduce my date— Patty.

name: Krabs
dialog: Your date's a...Krabby Patty? [to Squidward] Methinks the boy's really lost it.

name: Squidward
dialog: [sniffs the odor and wafts the air] What's that putrid odor?

name: Krabs
dialog: [sniffs] Oh, it's that Krabby Patty. [the patty is messy as a foghorn blows] What are you doing with that rotten piece of meat, boy?

name: SpongeBob
dialog: This isn't a “piece-o-meat”, Mr. Krabs. She's Patty. [quietly] And we're on a special date tonight so you don't mind if we get the "manager's treatment," do you?

name: Krabs
dialog: Sorry, boy. no can do.

name: SpongeBob
dialog: Oh, really? Mr. Fiver says different. [shows a $5 bill]

name: Krabs
dialog: What was that? I couldn't hear you.

name: SpongeBob
dialog: [gets out more money] How about now?

name: Krabs
dialog: All right, take a seat. [takes the money]

name: SpongeBob
dialog: Grrrrrazie! [gets out a tiny throne seat for Patty] Here you go, my dear. A throne befitting a queen. [Squidward shows up. Speaks with a French accent] Oh, good evening, monsieur. What might we have on the menu at this fine establishment?

name: Squidward
dialog: Well, you should know considering the fact you work here, sod for brains. Speaking of sods— why don't you get rid of this garbage? It's starting to stink up the joint.

name: SpongeBob
dialog: Don't say such a thing, Squidward. Patty's just a little sick is all. Wight, Wubbie-Lubbie.

name: Squidward
dialog: I'll show you sick. [grabs the patty]

name: SpongeBob
dialog: Squidward, what are you doing with my beautiful patty?

name: Squidward
dialog: Beautiful, huh?! How beautiful do you think this is?! [patty has maggots in it and is gross]

name: SpongeBob
dialog: [takes patty from Squidward] Stop it, Squidward! Maybe you can't see Patty's beauty. But to me, she's the most gorgeous creature in the sea.

name: Squidward
dialog: Well, I definitely see I can't help the mentally atrophied. Goodbye, Creature.

name: SpongeBob
dialog: Patty, you no mind to that, wubbie-wubbie. I will always love you— [sniffs] Yeah, what is that smell? [gasps] Patty? [the patty looks the same way it was before when SpongeBob showed Mr. Krabs and Squidward. Screams as he drops the Krabby Patty on the table] What's happened to you?!

name: Krabs
dialog: I think I can explain, boy. There was a time when I was in love too. She was a Krabby Patty that looked a lot like yours does. [rotten tomatoes fall out of the patty] Well, maybe not right now, but you know what I mean. She was a firm, juicy, a warm patty. And attractive- oh, she looked good enough to eat. So— I did. do you hear what I'm saying to you, boy?

name: SpongeBob
dialog: Um, not quite, Mr. Krabs.

name: Krabs
dialog: Krabby Patties are meant to be loved and eaten. That's what they're put in the ocean for. And it looks like yours is way past due.

name: SpongeBob
dialog: I see now. I see what I must do. [jumps up on the table] Oh, Patty, my darling. Before I do this, I want you to know that I only do it out of love! [the sickness rumbles. Eats it]

name: Krabs
dialog: Well done, boy. As a reward for your valiant effort, I'll only charge you 25¢ for the patty. Employee discount.

name: SpongeBob
dialog: [gags] Can I get a doggie bag with that?

name: SpongeBob
dialog: You're nothing! Is all that grime meant to scare me, Mr. Mirror? I've met sardines tougher than you are. Time to put you in your place. [squirts soap on his head and scrubs the mirror clean, then puts his work hat on his head from his nose] Looking good, mirror! Sorry about the harsh words. [gets a mop and a bucket] Now to attack these floors!

name: Krabs
dialog: [in his office, on the phone, chuckling] Are you kidding? He's an absolute treasure to have around the restaurant!

name: SpongeBob
dialog: [chuckles] Sounds like Mr. Krabs is bragging about me again to his associates. [turns to reveal an ear on his back]

name: Krabs
dialog: And he's been with me for such a long time now.

name: SpongeBob
dialog: [chuckles again] I am.

name: Krabs
dialog: But I'm afraid I'm gonna have to let the little guy go today.

name: SpongeBob
dialog: Yep, he's gonna have to-- [notices, shocked] What? Let the little guy go?! Little guy? Who's the little guy? It must be either me, or... [gasps] Squidward! [SpongeBob stands behind Squidward, who is sitting down] Phew! I am taller. You're the little guy, Squidsy!

name: Squidward
dialog: [stands up] No, and I want you to stop calling me Squidsy. [walks away]

name: SpongeBob
dialog: Oh, Squidward looked taller there for a second. Better get a more accurate measurement. [stands right next to Squidward in the workstation]

name: Squidward
dialog: What do you think you're doing?

name: SpongeBob
dialog: Oh, just seeing which one of us is the little guy... [makes himself taller, like a skyscraper] ...and it looks like it is you!

name: Squidward
dialog: No, I'm not! [walks away]

name: SpongeBob
dialog: Squidward, wait! [becomes short again] We haven't measured with my legs at full extension yet! [extends his legs]

name: Squidward
dialog: [off-screen] I don't care! Now get back in the kitchen!

name: SpongeBob
dialog: You'll care when you find out what's gonna happen to the little guy. Whoa! [walks off balance, then falls and breaks a table] Oh, who am I kidding? I need to face the facts. [makes a strange face] Face the facts that I'm the little guy! [tears up, making another face] And that Mr. Krabs is letting me go today.

name: Squidward
dialog: [smiles] Krabs is letting you go today? [laughs] As in I won't have to work with you ever again. [laughs]

name: SpongeBob
dialog: [walks through the doors and becomes flattened, sad] Goodbye, Krusty Krab. Goodbye, life as I know it. [the wind blows SpongeBob away]

name: Krabs
dialog: [still on the phone] Yeah, as much as I don't like doing it, I have to let him go. [a little scallop in a cage is shown] Gotten too big for his cage. [releases the scallop] Go on, little guy. Fly away. You'll be missed.

name: Gary
dialog: [meows questioningly]

name: SpongeBob
dialog: Oh, what's the use, Gary? [his body pops up to his normal self] I've lost the will to go on! [bursts into tears on the couch, then stops, noticing a rumble from a refrigerator Patrick is pulling with a rope] [sniffs sadly] Hi, Patrick.

name: Patrick
dialog: Oh, sorry to interrupt your fit of self-loathing, SpongeBob. [happily] I'm just borrowing your refrigerator again.

name: SpongeBob
dialog: [confused] What happened to yours?

name: Patrick
dialog: Nothing, it's just empty.

name: SpongeBob
dialog: [sad] Oh, get it out of my sight! Now that I have no means of purchasing food for myself, I do not need a refrigerator.

name: Patrick
dialog: Oh, don't get down on yourself, buddy. You can still purchase food for me.

name: SpongeBob
dialog: Oh, no, I can't, Patrick. I lost my job today. I won't be able to buy food for you, [sniffles] or Gary, [sniffles again] or for anybody!

name: Patrick
dialog: [shocked] Oh, no! What are you gonna do?!

name: SpongeBob
dialog: [sad] I don't know! I don't know! I don't know! I've been a fry cook for so long I... I don't think I can do anything else.

name: Patrick
dialog: [gets an idea, happily] I know, SpongeBob! Just do what I do when I'm looking for a job. [runs to the couch, then sits on it] Kick back, watch some TV, [turns the TV on with his remote, then holds a carton of Drinkable Sausage with a close-up shot of it] and chug down a carton on Drinkable Sausage! [drinks from the carton]

name: Gary
dialog: [meows while sitting on some newspaper]

name: SpongeBob
dialog: [happily] Good, Gary! There had to be some job openings in the classifieds. [picks up one newspaper while noticing its dirty smell] Whoa! Although, these ads smell a little out of date. I better get some fresh ones. [bubble transition to SpongeBob reading a clean newspaper] Lawyer, no. Too much arguing. Stunt driver, don't have a boating license. Astronaut, don't like food in a bag. Oh, this one sounds interesting. Bank Teller Needed. That shouldn't be too much of a stretch from fry cooking. [bubble transition to SpongeBob counting money at a bank while having his name tag on] 20, 40, 60, 80, 90, 95, 96, 97. [flips money up with his spatula, then chops it all up, some flying onto Fred's head, forming the money into a Krabby Patty, as seen in a close-up shot of it] Order up! [rings the bell once, then employee takes SpongeBob's name tag off, causing SpongeBob to lose air inside of him] [bubble transition to SpongeBob hammering a nail while building a house] What do you think, boss?

name: Carpenter
dialog: [looks at his house, shocked] Clam shells! What have you done, boy? [looks at a piece of paper showing what the real house looks like, while then looking at a house built by SpongeBob shaped into a Krabby Patty] I told you to build me a house, not a sandwich! [kicks SpongeBob and Patrick out of the construction site]

name: SpongeBob
dialog: I guess I'm not a carpenter, Patrick. [walks in front of a billboard showing a live sponge] I need to start fresh. [some words on the billboard sparkle as SpongeBob talks] With a job that feels... natural. Something that says, "This is a job for a sponge." Any idea where I can find a job like that, Patrick?

name: Patrick
dialog: No. Oh, but, yes! It's so obvious! You should work at the Krusty Krab. They need a fry cook!

name: SpongeBob
dialog: I can't, Patrick. That's the job I got fired from, remember?

name: Patrick
dialog: Ohhh. Mayhaps you should talk to the sponge behind you. He looks happy.

name: SpongeBob
dialog: That's just a billboard, Patrick.

name: Patrick
dialog: Why don't you get a job as a billboard?

name: SpongeBob
dialog: I...don't think that's physically possible, [happily] but I could audition to be a sponge model.

name: Patrick
dialog: Fine, do it your way.

name: SpongeBob
dialog: Wow! What a setup! Oh, I don't know, Patrick. Maybe this was a mistake. Maybe I don't have the talent.

name: Patrick
dialog: Oh, you have the talent. But do you have the natural ability?

name: SpongeBob
dialog: Yeah, but...wait, isn't that the same thing?

name: Patrick
dialog: Why don't you find out?

name: SpongeBob
dialog: [quickly covers the door] Wait! I can't do this, Patrick. What if I don't stack up to the competition? Maybe I should just beg Mr. Krabs for my old job back. [starts walking out, but Patrick stops him]

name: Patrick
dialog: No way! It's too late for that now. Krabs doesn't need you anymore. This is your chance to prove you don't need him. Now get in there and earn me some groceries! [pushes SpongeBob through the door to a lady fish, a casting director, looking at a clipboard] [to casting director] My friend here wants to audition for the sponge model role.

name: SpongeBob
dialog: Oh, well, want is a strong word. I'd like an audition, but if you've already cast it, that's fine if you cast it. [to Patrick] I think she's already cast it. We'd better go, Patrick.

name: Director
dialog: [stops SpongeBob and Patrick from walking out] Hold it. You want the audition, kid? You got it.

name: SpongeBob
dialog: [turns his whole body around, happily] I did?

name: Director
dialog: Show me what you got.

name: SpongeBob
dialog: [sweats, worried] Okay. Here goes. [clears throat] Patrick, please? [Patrick hands out a metal tool and hits it on his forehead, playing a note] ♪ Laaa! ♪ [clears throat again] Sorry. [keeps clearing throat and getting a perfect pitch at the same time, from high to low]

name: Director
dialog: Okay, okay, okay! Let's get on with this train wreck.

name: SpongeBob
dialog: Okay, getting on it. [clears throat yet again, then sings off-key] ♪ When you dream upon a wish, you'll be heartened to know, that hope fills your dish, to the brim! ♪

name: Director
dialog: [unenthusiastically] All right, all right. Thank you. I've heard enough.

name: SpongeBob
dialog: [runs closely to the casting director] How'd I do?

name: Director
dialog: Horribly. I've seen clams with more talent than you. [SpongeBob falls down] But since the role specifically calls for a real sponge, the part is yours. [SpongeBob slowly gets up] Here's the script. We start shooting tomorrow at 10. Don't be late. [SpongeBob rips himself in half, happily snatches the script, then jumps out of the building]

name: SpongeBob
dialog: I guess a sponge can make it in this town. [his pupils turn into stars] I am going to be a star! [a crowd suddenly comes close to SpongeBob, cheering while holding camera and microphones, while a news reporter faces a camera close to SpongeBob]

name: Barbara
dialog: I'm standing here with the new face of television, Mr. SpongeBob SquarePants. [to SpongeBob] I'm sure the viewing audience would love to know, how does it feel to be the next big thing?

name: SpongeBob
dialog: Fantastic. [puts on sunglasses, then signs an autograph and waves at the crowd chanting, "SpongeBob! SpongeBob!"]

name: Patrick
dialog: SpongeBob. Hey, SpongeBob. Did you say something?

name: SpongeBob
dialog: Oh, yes, I did, Patrick. [points to himself] I said, "You're looking at the new face of television."

name: Patrick
dialog: All right!

name: SpongeBob
dialog: Well, I better go home and get some beauty sleep.

name: Patrick
dialog: Yeah, beauty sleep!

name: SpongeBob
dialog: That's right. You are looking at a changed sponge. But don't worry. I won't forget all the people who held me on the way up.

name: Krabs
dialog: [walks by, carrying golf supplies and even wearing golf clothes] Afternoon, boy-o!

name: SpongeBob
dialog: Ah, just as I was saying. I'd like to thank you for giving me my humble start. I won't forget you. [he and Patrick walk by]

name: Krabs
dialog: [scratches his head] What was that about? Oh, probably just nonsense and babbling, as usual. [walks away]

name: SpongeBob
dialog: Patrick, when next you see me, it shall be on the television. [walks into his house]

name: Director
dialog: Oh, you're back!

name: SpongeBob
dialog: A star's first day is his most important.

name: Director
dialog: Great. Let me see if they're ready on set. [through a microphone] SpongeBob's here, sir. Uh-huh. Okay, great. [to SpongeBob] Okay, you can go right in.

name: SpongeBob
dialog: Yippee! [happily runs into the set, toward a spotlight] I am ready for my close-up, Mr. Director.

name: Director
dialog: [with a French accent] Very well. [through a megaphone] Lose the pants! [a claw snatches SpongeBob's pants, making him naked] Hans! Where's my star?! [a live-action hand comes out of a dressing room and grabs SpongeBob]

name: SpongeBob
dialog: Whoa! What's happening? [lights turn on behind SpongeBob, showing a dirty bathroom set] Wh-wh-what's happening?!

name: Director
dialog: In this scene, you'll be cleaning bathroom mixtures.

name: SpongeBob
dialog: Okay, so, uh, where's my cleaning utensil?

name: Director
dialog: [mumbles angrily and quietly] Don't you get it? You are the cleaning utensil. [SpongeBob suddenly frowns] Roll speed! [a red light turns on from a camera]

name: Charlie
dialog: [as a movie assistant, holding a movie clipboard] New Sponge Commercial: Take one. [closes clipboard]

name: Director
dialog: [through a megaphone] Action!

name: Announcer
dialog: [off-screen] Oh, no! Your bathroom is a disaster. Get it cleaned up fast with...the new sponge! [while on camera, SpongeBob groans] Household chores are a snap with new sponge. It cleans sinks. [sink shines after being cleaned by a now dirty SpongeBob] Just look at that shine! New sponge cuts through even the toughest grime and grit. New sponge also cleans showers! [SpongeBob screams while cleaning the shower, which shines too] Ha, ha! That tile looks good as new! [SpongeBob sighs, tired] But best of all, new sponge can make any toilet sparkle! [as SpongeBob hears this, he looks at the toilet dirty inside before going straight in]

name: SpongeBob
dialog: Noooo! [suddenly stops right before he goes in] I can't do this!

name: Director
dialog: [through a megaphone] Cut!

name: SpongeBob
dialog: I'm sorry. I don't think I'm cut out for acting.

name: Director
dialog: Was? You said you were professional actor.

name: SpongeBob
dialog: Well, I'm not. [puts on his work hat] I am a fry cook. [holds up his spatula] That's what I am, and that's what I've always been! I'm sorry to waste your time, mister. [walks away]

name: Director
dialog: Wait! Wait!

name: Krabs
dialog: Ever so gently...

name: SpongeBob
dialog: [slams door loudly, causing Mr. Krabs' money pyramid to fall down] Mr. Krabs! [while crying a trail of tears toward Mr. Krabs] Please let me back, please! I promise I'll do better. [hugs Mr. Krabs] Please.

name: Krabs
dialog: Boy, what are you going on about?!

name: SpongeBob
dialog: [sniffles] I heard you on the phone saying you were gonna let the little guy go. But I don't wanna go! Please don't let me go, Mr. Krabs! You're looking at the little guy that doesn't want to go.

name: Krabs
dialog: All right, boy-o! I won't get rid of ya: on one condition. [SpongeBob happily nods]

name: SpongeBob
dialog: Oh, boy! This is the best job in the world!

name: Hans
dialog: Hey, could you keep it down in there? [shown reading a newspaper in a stall while on a toilet] I'm trying to concentrate.

name: Patrick
dialog: [walking] So why are we going to Sandy's house?

name: SpongeBob
dialog: To see her vacation slides for the hu.. [gets smacked in face by door] Ow!

name: Agent
dialog: [Walking out the door with his partner and the slides] We got the slides, sir.

name: Patrick
dialog: Who?...What?...Why?

name: Sandy
dialog: [Taking SpongeBob and Patrick] Those two agents from the Zero Dryland Security just confiscated all my vacation slides, boys. Or so they think... [She pulls a tree trunk lever to activate a secret hideout] You see, [puts the two on two chairs. She goes to a copy of the vacation slides] Someone already made six copies.

name: Sandy
dialog: Yes, SpongeBob?

name: SpongeBob
dialog: Who is this someone? Do we know him?

name: Sandy
dialog: By someone, I was implying me, SpongeBob. [Patrick raises his hand] Yes, Patrick?

name: Patrick
dialog: Can you not imply anymore? It's confusing.

name: Sandy
dialog: [tying up SpongeBob and Patrick with rope] Okay, no more questions until the end of the slideshow. Okay? [they nod in agreement] Good. [shows the first slide] The first slide is of me getting some last-minute readings before I took off on my vacation. [switches to the next slide] And this is me giving the thumbs-up-goodbye for now salute. [shows the next slide] And this... [dreadfully] This is where a little square pal of mine decided to pay me a visit.

name: SpongeBob
dialog: [walking to Sandy's house] ♪I'm ready to see Sandy. I'm ready to see Sandy. I'm ready to see Sandy [spinning] I'm ready to ring Sandy's doorbell♪ [rings the doorbell; suddenly, an extreme humming noise vibrates the ocean floor] Sandy...! [a rocket emerges from beneath the ground] Whoa!

name: Sandy
dialog: What do you think of my moon wagon?

name: SpongeBob
dialog: Oh, Sandy. I'm sorry I activated it! How was I to know it was hooked up to your doorbell?

name: Sandy
dialog: Oh no, SpongeBob. That's what you call a "coincidence." I'm getting ready for my vacation!

name: SpongeBob
dialog: Where are you going?

name: Sandy
dialog: The moon! [SpongeBob gasps]

name: SpongeBob
dialog: You're going on a moon trip?!

name: Sandy
dialog: Yep! I'm all packed up and ready to go. Wanna help me…

name: SpongeBob
dialog: I'll be right back!

name: Sandy
dialog: ...load up the moon wagon? [sighs]

name: SpongeBob
dialog: [SpongeBob is at bakery] Morning, Mr. Bakerman! Oh, that's right, I'm sorry. I have to pick a number. [attempts to pull a ticket, but fails and gets tangled up]

name: Bakerman
dialog: Number 12.

name: SpongeBob
dialog: Yes, I'm Number 12!

name: Bakerman
dialog: What can I get for you today?

name: SpongeBob
dialog: I need a bon voyage sheet cake. [Bakerman brings out out sheet cake] Could you put yummy words on it? Hmmmmm, what would those yummy words be? I got it! "Have fun on the moon...". What rhymes with "moon"? Tune? Roon? Noon? Goon?

name: Bakerman
dialog: How about “loon?”

name: SpongeBob
dialog: I got it! "See you soon!”

name: Countdown
dialog: [SpongeBob heads back to Sandy’s dome with the cake. The rocket is a few seconds from takeoff] T-minus 12, 11, 10, 9, 8…

name: SpongeBob
dialog: No, Sandy! Wait! You can't go without your sheet cake! [grabs a hold of the ladder, but falls into the rocket] Whoa!

name: Sandy
dialog: [sees SpongeBob] SpongeBob? What in cold chicken and pickles are you doing in my ship?

name: SpongeBob
dialog: [panting, and out of breath] I went to get you a, so I went to the, and then I got you a, and then T-minus something, and…

name: Countdown
dialog: Launch commencing.

name: Sandy
dialog: Never mind. Can't stop the countdown now. Better strap yourself down. Looks like you're going on a mooncation!

name: SpongeBob
dialog: I am?! Whoooooo! Moon trip! Moon trip! Moon trip! [rocket takes off] Hey, Sandy? Sandy? Sandy? Sandy? Sandy? Hey, Sandy...

name: Sandy
dialog: Uh, I'm kinda busy here, SpongeBob. Gotta recalculate to account for the extra weight.

name: SpongeBob
dialog: Oh, I just wanted to show you the…

name: Sandy
dialog: for the afterburners! [activates afterburners; propels rocket further] What were you saying, SpongeBob?

name: SpongeBob
dialog: Oh, I… brought you a “bon voyage” sheet cake.

name: Sandy
dialog: You can't bring regular food into space!

name: SpongeBob
dialog: Wha, wha, wha, why not?

name: Sandy
dialog: Because, as we leave Earth's gravity, everything becomes weightless, and any un-contained food will float off in all directions!

name: SpongeBob
dialog: Oh. Is that a bad thing?

name: Sandy
dialog: Only if it gets sucked into the reverse spatial linearity drive. [cake floats into the reverse spatial linearity drive. The rocket engine malfunctions and turns off] Ah nuts!

name: SpongeBob
dialog: Oops. Sorry, Sandy.

name: Sandy
dialog: [presses "Toss" button, and gets dressed in a large space suit] Well, it's a good thing I've brought my special space suit designed for just this kind of situation! Now, try not to file anything else up while I'm saving our necks. [goes into space] Aha! There's our problem. [clears the cake out from the the reverse spatial linearity drive.] Eh, could've used more nuts. [comes back inside rocket] Okay. I've got her up and running, again. Now, can you please sit with your hands folded for a while, SpongeBob?

name: SpongeBob
dialog: Roger that! Folding hands.

name: Sandy
dialog: Now, get ready for lunar module se…

name: SpongeBob
dialog: [folds hands into a bird] What do you think Sandy?

name: Sandy
dialog: Just don't touch anything while we separate.

name: SpongeBob
dialog: Ok.

name: Sandy
dialog: [detaches rocket from boosters] That looks like a good spot. [lands on the moon, sets camp up] Alright, SpongeBob. Now that our camp is set up, it's time for some moon crater boarding! [brings out boards]

name: SpongeBob
dialog: What's moon crater boarding?

name: Sandy
dialog: You ride these on that like this. [jumps on and rides her snowboard on the moon] Yeehaw! Right here is the Flip-a-dee-do-dah. [flips her board in midair] Right there is the classic Texas tail grab. [grabs tail, and twists it into the shape of Texas] And this I call the 7-20 Nut Drop. [spins and breaks an asteroid into an acorn and eats it] Munchie! And let's not forget my grandpappy's favorite: The Tour de Saturn. [lies down on Saturn's rings] Star gazer! Yeehaw! Nothing like extreme sports and zero gravity! Alright your turn.

name: SpongeBob
dialog: Oh gee Sandy. I don't know. This looks kinda scary.

name: Sandy
dialog: Oh, come on SpongeBob. You got this! It's a can of corn.

name: SpongeBob
dialog: I don't know what corn is, but I sure like cans. Alright, I'll give it a try. [jumps on board and floats off into space] Sandy, this doesn't seem right.

name: Sandy
dialog: Uh oh! Looks like SpongeBob's too light for lunar gravity. SpongeBob, grab a hold of this! [lassos asteroid to SpongeBob]

name: SpongeBob
dialog: [grabs onto asteroid] Ok. [the rock pulls SpongeBob to the moon surface. SpongeBob begins to surf the moon, but screams]

name: Sandy
dialog: Wow, SpongeBob! What do you call that trick? [SpongeBob keeps screaming] Interesting. Maybe you can teach me how to do a “Waaaaah!”

name: SpongeBob
dialog: [SpongeBob continues screaming, and begins to surf over a satellite] Hey, this is kind of fun! [leaps, and bounces off the satellite, damaging it]

name: Billy
dialog: [shifts to Patrick watching TV] Carol, your real father is… [TV goes out due to satellite damage]

name: Patrick
dialog: Hey! Who's Carol's real father?!

name: SpongeBob
dialog: [scene returns to SpongeBob] Watch this Sandy! [ties an asteroid to his helmet to hold him down] Alright. A no-look... let's see... a one-footed, tongue-out, flip, leg up… [accidentally smashes into rocket's fuel tank, making it leak] puncture into the side of the rocket.

name: Sandy
dialog: You did great, SpongeBob! But, you should call your trick the "no-look, one-footed, tongue-out, flip, leg up, puncture the fuel tank on the rocket.”

name: SpongeBob
dialog: Oops!

name: Sandy
dialog: Come on, SpongeBob. We gotta get while there's still enough fuel to make it home!

name: SpongeBob
dialog: Wait! I have to do something very important! [takes picture of himself “holding the earth”] There! [both go into the rocket, and head for earth] So, we are going to make it, aren’t we Sandy?

name: Sandy
dialog: If the fuel holds out, there's no reason to panic. [rocket fuel signs shows “Empty”. Rocket starts falling to earth] Without the engines, we've lost all control. We're coming in too steep!

name: SpongeBob
dialog: Is that bad?

name: Sandy
dialog: [unbuckles seatbelt] Only if you consider being consumed in a giant fireball “bad”.

name: SpongeBob
dialog: Well, in that case, I won’t… giant fireball?! [unbuckles seatbelt, but hits wall] Sandy, where are you going?

name: Sandy
dialog: 'm going to take this bull by the horns! [Lassos the nose of the rocket. Rocket begins to catch fire as it descends towards earth]

name: SpongeBob
dialog: Are we gonna get consumed in a giant fireball?

name: Sandy
dialog: Not if I can keep her nose up we aren't. Hang on! It's gonna get bumpy when we hit the atmosphere. [the rocket keeps falling at a faster rate. SpongeBob yells in terror] Yeehaw!

name: SpongeBob
dialog: [continues screaming] My goodness!

name: Sandy
dialog: Yeehaw! Yeehaw! [rockets crashes]

name: SpongeBob
dialog: Oh, oh my gosh! Sandy! Sandy, are you okay? [Sandy groans] Oh, Sandy. I'm sorry I ruined your vacation.

name: Sandy
dialog: Ruined? Oh heck no! That was the most fun I've had in a toad's age! Once I get my rocket fixed, you and me is heading to Mars. Now, let's go grab another one of them sheet cakes.

name: them
dialog: [laugh]

name: Squidward
dialog: Maybe I'll do a cute little button. [pulls his nose to give himself a button-nose. His nose pops out suddenly.] Or something a bit more manly perhaps. [pulls his nose hairs to create a mustache and a humanoid nose. His nose pops out back to normal suddenly] Upturned might be good, too. [breathes in, puts his thumb into his mouth, and then blows. He gets an upturned nose. Just then, SpongeBob appears in his unicycle.]

name: SpongeBob
dialog: Hi, Squidward.

name: Squidward
dialog: Great. [slaps himself] The idiot found me.

name: SpongeBob
dialog: Whatcha doing?

name: Squidward
dialog: I'm picking a nose.

name: SpongeBob
dialog: Ooh! I used to pick my nose too, until I finally cleared it out.

name: Squidward
dialog: I'm not picking my nose, SpongeBob. I'm on the way to the hospital for a nose job. Plastic surgery. I'm finally gonna get the nose I should have been born with.

name: SpongeBob
dialog: [gasps] But, Squidward, you're a beautiful flower. You don't need to change a... [freaks out when he sees how hideously disgusting Squidward's nose is up close] Well, maybe a little work wouldn't hurt. Hey, you want a ride?

name: Squidward
dialog: With you? Absolutely not.

name: SpongeBob
dialog: Aww, come on, Squidward. [pedals off and comes back with a trashcan attached to his unicycle] I can get you there lickety-split.

name: Nurse
dialog: You can't dump your garbage here, sir.

name: SpongeBob
dialog: Oh, that's not garbage. That's my friend, Squidward. We're here to check in.

name: Nurse
dialog: Holy nostroly! You must be here for the nose job. Let's, uh, get your paperwork filled out.

name: Surgeon
dialog: You just relax, sir. The doctor will be ready for you soon.

name: Squidward
dialog: [inhales deeply] Ah. This is nice.

name: SpongeBob
dialog: Never fear, Squidward. Soon this dreary old room will be so full of well-wishing you'll never want to go home.

name: Narrator
dialog: Five minutes later...

name: Squidward
dialog: [grunts as he pops out of his pile of teddy bears] SpongeBob, get this garbage out of here! I can hardly move!

name: SpongeBob
dialog: Oh, are you uncomfortable? Here, let me help.

name: Bear
dialog: I love you.

name: Squidward
dialog: [grunts as he rips the teddy off of him] The bed is fine!

name: SpongeBob
dialog: Fluff your pillow?

name: Squidward
dialog: No.

name: SpongeBob
dialog: Fluff your IV bag?

name: Squidward
dialog: Enough, you buffoon!

name: SpongeBob
dialog: Well, gee, Squidward, I was just trying to be helpful.

name: Squidward
dialog: [sighs] If you want to help so badly, why don't you just go volunteer to be a candy striper? There's plenty of other people in the hospital you could torture.

name: SpongeBob
dialog: Squidward, that's a great idea. I was born to serve.

name: SpongeBob
dialog: Hello, lady, can I be a candy striper here at the—

name: Nurse
dialog: Grab a uniform out of the closet.

name: SpongeBob
dialog: Ooh, thank you! Thank you! Whoo! [runs into the closet and comes back out with a uniform] Ooh! Candy stripes. [slurps on the strips] Strawberry.

name: Doctor
dialog: Ah, Doctor, thank goodness you're here.

name: Doctor
dialog: We were just looking for another physician to join us on our rounds.

name: Doctor
dialog: And what seems to be the problem today?

name: Catfish
dialog: [coughing] My throat hurts.

name: Doctor
dialog: Prescribe him a numbing throat spray. Let's move on, shall we?

name: SpongeBob
dialog: Wait a second! I think I've seen this before. [rubs his finger all over the catfish and abstracts some filth] Mm, yeah. [licks the filth] Mm-hmm. I'll need one medical sea-chicken.

name: Catfish
dialog: Hey, my keys. And my throat feels better.

name: SpongeBob
dialog: You see, doctors, catfish are bottom feeders. The dirt on his face led me to believe he had recently eaten something that irritated his throat. Happens to my friend Patrick all the time. [grunts as he pulls out a pen, pencil and paintbrush from his head] Mm-hmm. [picks a pen and writes something down on a paper] Try a Krabby Patty next time, sir. They go down smooth, and they taste better than car keys.

name: Catfish
dialog: Thanks, doc.

name: SpongeBob
dialog: No need to thank me, sir. I'm here to help.

name: Doctor
dialog: What treatment might you prescribe for this next patient, Doctor?

name: Runner
dialog: So what do you think? Will I be able to run in the Bikini Bottom marathon next week?

name: Doctor
dialog: Oh, my, no. I'm afraid you're—

name: SpongeBob
dialog: Of course! Friends don't let friends miss marathons. We'll have you up in no time. [looks around and sees a skeleton] Ah!

name: Runner
dialog: What are you—

name: Doctor
dialog: Most unorthodox.

name: Doctor
dialog: He's a genius.

name: Runner
dialog: Thanks, doc.

name: SpongeBob
dialog: Ready, set. [blows blowhorn as the runner runs out backwards]

name: Doctor
dialog: And what seems to be your problem today, ma'am?

name: Puff
dialog: Sometimes, I just don't have it in me to puff up under my own power.

name: SpongeBob
dialog: Hi, Mrs. Puff.

name: Puff
dialog: No! Not you! [whimpers] What are you doing here?

name: SpongeBob
dialog: [whispers] Don't worry, Mrs. Puff. I'm a doctor...today. What is this crazy thing? Looks like some sort of weird submarine. [climbs through the iron lung]

name: Doctor
dialog: You're kidding of course. We've placed her in an iron lung to help puff her back up.

name: SpongeBob
dialog: Ha-ha! Dive! Dive! Up periscope! Load the torpedoes. [imitates airplane]

name: Puff
dialog: Huh?

name: Puff
dialog: [whispers] Help me! [screams]

name: doctor
dialog: Hey!

name: Runner
dialog: My legs!

name: SpongeBob
dialog: Never fear, Mrs. Puff. I haven't lost a patient all day. [puts on medical goggles] Let's get medical.

name: SpongeBob
dialog: Oh, no.

name: Puff
dialog: Oh. Actually, I feel like my old self again. But you still don't get a driver's license. [shrinks down to normal size and falls to the ground] Oh!

name: Doctor
dialog: Wow. I've never seen anyone work an iron lung like that.

name: Doctor
dialog: So awesome.

name: Doctor
dialog: We were on our way to perform a surgery...

name: Doctor
dialog: But we would be honored to watch you perform it.

name: SpongeBob
dialog: Me? Perform a surgery?

name: Squidward
dialog: Oh, yeah, this is the life. And best of all, there's no SpongeBob here to ruin it.

name: SpongeBob
dialog: Oh, boy, surgery! And on my first day too.

name: Squidward
dialog: SpongeBob? No! What are you doing here?

name: Surgeon
dialog: Nighty night, Mr. Tentacles.

name: Squidward
dialog: Wait, wait, no, no, no, no!

name: SpongeBob
dialog: Oh, hi, everybody.

name: surgeons
dialog: Hi, SpongeBob.

name: Doctor
dialog: Doctor, the patient's over here, and he's ready for you to begin.

name: Doctor
dialog: Oh, we're most eager to see which tool you select first.

name: SpongeBob
dialog: [looks for a tool] Hmm, mm—mm—mm—mm. Let me see. Whoa, whoa, whoa! Phew. [picks up a spatula] Here we go!

name: surgeons
dialog: Oh! Ah!

name: SpongeBob
dialog: Okay, SpongeBob, this can't be too hard. Just make an incision here, and— [operates with the spatula and ink sprays up] no! Shoot! [the heart flips] Son of a gun! [continues to work, but breaks Squidward's foot off] Ah, my bad.

name: Surgeon
dialog: I'll take that. [takes the foot]

name: SpongeBob
dialog: Ah-ha! [chops with spatula and makes sushi] Mmm, sushi.

name: SpongeBob
dialog: He's, uh, really going to pieces over this nose job.

name: SpongeBob
dialog: Oh, [chuckles] thank you! Let's try again, shall we?

name: SpongeBob
dialog: Order up!

name: SpongeBob
dialog: Yow! That shouldn't be in there. [pulls ribbon and sees another one] Ooh! [pulls more ribbons out and a clipboard]

name: Doctor
dialog: What? [notices his clipboard is missing] Oh.

name: SpongeBob
dialog: Ta-da!

name: SpongeBob
dialog: Nurse, sponge.

name: SpongeBob
dialog: Thank you, nurse.

name: Doctor
dialog: I can't see! I can't see! I want to see!

name: Doctor
dialog: I still can't see.

name: SpongeBob
dialog: Ta-da!

name: SpongeBob
dialog: There we go. You can wake him up now, nurse.

name: Squidward
dialog: [wakes up and groans] What—what happened?

name: SpongeBob
dialog: I finished your nose job, you silly goose. Take a look.

name: Squidward
dialog: SpongeBob, you idiot! This isn't even close to what I wanted!

name: SpongeBob
dialog: Well, why didn't you say so? Oh, nurse!

name: Squidward
dialog: Wait, no, no, no! I want a different doctor! I—

name: Squidward
dialog: No! [with a noisemaker] No! [with an elephant's trunk] No! [with clarinet] No! [with crabs nose] No! [with log] No! [with the face of Squilliam Fancyson] No! [with a reindeer's head] No! [with his house] No! [with real life octopus] No! [with car engine and it flares up] No-o-o-o! [sobbing]

name: Squidward
dialog: Stop! I don't want to change my nose anymore! SpongeBob, I'll do anything! Anything at—

name: SpongeBob
dialog: How's about the Squidward Classic?

name: Squidward
dialog: Hey, not bad. This looks even better than my old nose.

name: SpongeBob
dialog: Well, I did have to use a few of your other body parts to re-sculpt it.

name: SpongeBob
dialog: D'oh! Look at the time. I have to go to work. [takes off his surgery outfit]

name: Doctor
dialog: But you're a doctor. You're at work.

name: SpongeBob
dialog: No, I'm just a fry cook. [puts on Krusty Krab hat] But it was fun playing with you guys. Bye! [leaves]

name: Doctor
dialog: Fry cook? Ooh. [faints in the green doctor's arms]

name: Squidward
dialog: Don't be afraid, ladies. This sinus Adonis is on the market.

name: SpongeBob
dialog: Ta-dah! [SpongeBob's house dances around] I did it! I did it! I did it! I did- [slips on something and makes silly noises] [smashes into the door and when it opens SpongeBob falls out and makes a funny noise]

name: Gary
dialog: [slithers toward SpongeBob] Meow.

name: SpongeBob
dialog: [circles around Gary] I learned a magic trick!

name: Gary
dialog: [gets scared and hides in his shell] Meow? [his eyes come out of his shell]

name: SpongeBob
dialog: Sorry, Gary, but I've been trying to learn this trick since I was a SpongeBoy. [gasps as Gary meows] I gotta show Patrick! [starts running toward Patrick's house and hits Norton]

name: Norton
dialog: [spits out mail]

name: SpongeBob
dialog: [finishes running toward Patrick's house and knocks on his rock] Patrick, come on, I got to show you something! [slides into Patrick's rock and makes a silly noise. He then lifts up Patrick's rock.] Patrick? He's not home. [Patrick's rock falls on him and he makes a grunt-like noise] Oh! Squidward! [Squidward goes into his trash can and slides it into his house and pretends like he's not home] Squidward! Squidward, Squidward, Squidward? Squidward? Squidward, Squidward, Squidward?

name: Squidward
dialog: If he thinks I'm out, he'll go away. [SpongeBob continues to say "Squidward" and his eye goes through Squidward's door.]

name: SpongeBob
dialog: [talks through his eye] Squidward! I'm so glad you're home. Got a magic trick to show ya!

name: Squidward
dialog: I hate magic.

name: SpongeBob
dialog: How could anyone hate magic? It's... [close-up of his face] ...magical.

name: Squidward
dialog: [sighs] Okay, show me the trick.

name: SpongeBob
dialog: [gasps in joy as Squidward runs away] Pick a card- oh. [Squidward runs out of his house, closes the door, and swallows the key. Squidward hums] Watch closely, Squidward. The hand is quicker than the eye.

name: Squidward
dialog: [groans and swallows his eyes] Can't watch. No eyes. Sorry.

name: SpongeBob
dialog: [groans and drops his cards] I want to show my trick to somebody. [cries and runs away while Squidward laughs and bumps into his front door]

name: Puff
dialog: [scene changes to Mrs. Puff having a student with braces take a drivers test] You're the best driving student I've ever had, Rodger. Kudos. [Rodger laughs]

name: SpongeBob
dialog: [as he's running to Mrs. Puff] Mrs. Puff! Mrs. Puff! Mrs. Puff!

name: Puff
dialog: [scared] Rodger, we have to move now! Punch it! [as the boat is driving, she accidentally hits a fire hydrant] I think we lost him. [SpongeBob arrives with the cards in his hand. Mrs. Puff makes a small scream]

name: SpongeBob
dialog: Mrs. Puff, you got to see my magic trick! [Mrs. Puff and Rodger scream and the boat crashes onto a rock. Rodger's braces break, while SpongeBob stands up with his cards] Pick a card, any card!

name: Puff
dialog: Hold on, SpongeBob, I have a trick to show you first. [Mrs. Puff puffs and she floats into the air] Sorry, Rodger, we'll pick this up next week!

name: SpongeBob
dialog: [hanging onto Mrs. Puff] Wait, Mrs. Puff, you didn't see my trick!

name: Puff
dialog: [frowns] Okay, show me the trick already.

name: SpongeBob
dialog: [gets off Mrs. Puff and shows his cards] Pick a card, any card! [SpongeBob falls down and slams onto Sandy's treedome. He slides down the treedome happily until he reaches the floor] Sandy! [goes inside the treedome and puts on his water helmet] Sandy, I gotta show you this. [he shows his cards] Pick a card, any card! [SpongeBob screams and drops all his cards as Sandy, who is watering her grass, is missing her head] Sandy? [SpongeBob touches the helmet and it falls off. SpongeBob looks to see where the head is] Where's your head?

name: Sandy
dialog: Oh, sorry, SpongeBob, didn't mean to spook ya. My head's in another dimension, observing. [cuts to Sandy in the Swamp, observing one of the trees. In the background, Bubble Bass and Patrick are on a log, trying to escape a group of crocodiles on their hovercraft]

name: SpongeBob
dialog: [leaving] Uh-huh, okay, I'll come back later when you have a head.

name: Sandy
dialog: It should be back by Thursday. Friday at the latest. [she starts watering her grass again]

name: Krabs
dialog: [SpongeBob runs to Mr. Krabs' house and rings the bell] Who is it? [opens his door]

name: SpongeBob
dialog: [shows his cards] Pick a card, any card! [Mr. Krabs gets frightened]

name: Krabs
dialog: [he smashes SpongeBob's head, making him bounce up and down and make music like an accordion] Magic, eh, boyo? [he leans his eyes toward him] Is this by any chance a trick where you produce money coins from behind people's ears? [as he's winking twice] Wink wink, hmm?

name: SpongeBob
dialog: [crouches down a little] No.

name: Krabs
dialog: Then what's the point? [closes his door angrily]

name: SpongeBob
dialog: [SpongeBob gets upset] Ah! [goes to Fred's home and rings his doorbell, which is a miniature leg]] Hi, Fred! [shows his cards] I've got a magic trick that's going to dazzle you!

name: Fred
dialog: [looks with interest] Ooh! Are you going to saw my leg in half, or make it disappear, or pull a rabbit out of it?

name: SpongeBob
dialog: [loses his smile] Uh, no, this isn't going to involve your leg.

name: Fred
dialog: [quickly looks at his watch] Ooh, gotta go, SpongeBob. I'm washing my thighs tonight. [goes inside and closes the door, only to accidentally cut his leg because of the door, while SpongeBob is surprised] My leg!

name: SpongeBob
dialog: [sighs as he walks into a kelp forest] Why won't anyone watch my trick?! [falls onto the ground while the word "trick" flies into the air, causing the leaves on the kelp trees to fall down onto SpongeBob] [SpongeBob gets up, covered with leaves. He slightly pulls his kelp mustache, and then sees two pieces of wood and a rock. A lightbulb appears on top of SpongeBob] Hey, that gives me an idea! [scene cuts to SpongeBob putting the final touches on his rock people] There. Good evening, folks, I am the Great Spongedini! Now watch closely, [reveals his cards] the hand is quicker than the eye. Pick a card. Any card. [SpongeBob inhales all the magic playing cards into his mouth, and then starts his magic trick.]

name: Spongedini
dialog: Huh? [The Great Spongedini pulls the ribbon out of his left sleeve, but then reveals a red, blue, pink, green, and orange ribbon that covers the whole screen. Then the scene becomes spirally and gets put into a magic hat. Then, the white screen turns back to the kelp forest and SpongeBob pulls himself out of the magic hat in a pink bunny suit, ending his magic trick.]

name: SpongeBob
dialog: Ta-dah! [notices that the audience he made was fake and didn't respond to his magic trick.] Oh... I still wish Patrick was here to see it. [then he notices Patrick sitting on a mushroom, hanging onto another mushroom.]

name: Patrick
dialog: [off-screen] I saw it, SpongeBob! [on-screen] It was astonishable! [Patrick falls of the mushroom and falls flat onto the ground, and pulls himself off the ground.]

name: SpongeBob
dialog: [hugging Patrick] Oh, Patrick! You showed up just in time. What was your favorite part?

name: Patrick
dialog: Uh... My favorite part was... uh..."Ta-dah!". I missed everything before that.

name: SpongeBob
dialog: Oh, then you haven't seen seen anything yet! [he grabs a hold of Patrick's hand. The two spin around and then they disappear into a magic hat. Some confetti and a card come out of the hat as the two laugh. Fireworks also start coming out of the hat, while the rock creatures stand inanimate.]

name: SpongeBob
dialog: ♪Oh, I've got an whole new attitude♪

name: Squidward
dialog: Oh, is that supposed to be singing? [paint brushes fall on the floor] I am putting that one on SpongeBob. [to SpongeBob] Would you clam up, SpongeBob? I am trying to paint in here!

name: SpongeBob
dialog: ♪I cherish my fellow residents...♪

name: Squidward
dialog: SpongeBob, why are you doing this?

name: SpongeBob
dialog: Oh, I'm just displaying for all to see an attitude of gratitude!
